abilities.name: Achilles Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.

abilities.name: Gift of the Gods
abilities.description: Achilles can choose to wear armor or forgo it. Wearing armor grants bonus Health and Protections , while forgoing it grants bonus Strength and Movement Speed . Achilles can swap between armor stats by using Basic Attacks while the Passive targeter is active inside the Fountain.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Achilles's chosen armor state also adds effects of Radiant Glory and Combat Dodge.

abilities.name: Shield of Achilles
abilities.description: Achilles punches forward with his shield, dealing 100 [80% Strength] Physical Damage and Stunning enemies in a short cone. The force of the shield radiates further, dealing reduced damage. The radiated force deals 70% Damage. Non-God targets take 115% Damage. Increased Stun duration when Armored, increased Scaling when forgoing your Armor.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
This ability can hit through walls.

abilities.name: Radiant Glory
abilities.description: Achilles is blessed by the Gods, gaining bonus Strength, Protections and Crowd Control Reduction for a short duration. Damaging enemies with abilities during this time Heals Achilles. When Armored, the God's blessings also grant you a Physical Shield . When forgoing Achilles's armor, hitting an enemy god with attacks from behind reduces their Protections .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Achilles may only heal up to 4 times per ability hit.
Healing 12 times during the buff's duration will cause the crowd to cheer for you.

abilities.name: Combat Dodge (Spear Strike)
abilities.description: Achilles Dodges in his current direction and readies his spear to strike enemies for 65 [45% Strength] Physical Damage . Hitting an enemy god with the strike allows Achilles to recast the ability before it goes on cooldown. When Armored, striking an enemy god with the spear Slows them, stacking up to 2 times. When forgoing the armor, the speed of the dodge is doubled.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Achilles can use Abilities and Basic Attacks between dashes.
After readying your spear, Achilles has 4 seconds to strike before the ability ends.

abilities.name: Fatal Strike
abilities.description: Achilles prepares briefly, then Dashes forward, dealing 180 [100% Strength] Physical Damage to enemies and Executing gods that are low health. Killing a god allows Achilles to recast this ability up to five times. Each kill exposes Achilles's heel, increasing Achilles's damage taken .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
The dash ends early upon hitting an enemy god.
Achilles is CC Immune during the preparation phase, and while Dashing (including when recast).
The preparation before the dash lasts 1 second.

abilities.name: Agni Basic Attack
abilities.description: Fires a projectile that deals Magical Damage to the first enemy hit.

stats: 100% Strength or Inhand Power and 20% Intelligence

abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

abilities.name: Combustion
abilities.description: Hitting an enemy with a Basic Attack provides 1 stack of Combustion. Hitting an enemy god provides 2. At 4 stacks Agni's next Flame Wave or Rain Fire will ignite all enemies hit, dealing 5 [6% Intelligence] Magical Damage every 0.5s for 3s. When Agni kills an enemy god, he goes on a Hot Streak, Combustion is fully charged and using Flame Wave or Rain Fire does not consume Combustion.

abilities.name: Noxious Fumes
abilities.description: Agni summons a cloud of noxious fumes which deals 10 [5% Intelligence] Magical Damage every second. Hitting the fumes with any of your other abilities detonates the gas, Stunning and dealing 20 [20% Intelligence] Magical Damage to enemies in the area.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Fumes last for 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Flame Wave
abilities.description: Agni summons a wave of fire, dealing 100 [65% Intelligence] Magical Damage] . Ignites Noxious Fumes.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Persists for 1 second after reaching max distance.

abilities.name: Path of Flames
abilities.description: Agni Dashes forward and leaves a trail of fire behind him. Enemies that enter the area take 20 [15% Intelligence] Magical Damage every .5s for 2 s. Agni is Displacement Immune while Dashing. Ignites Noxious Fumes.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Flame trail lasts for 3 seconds.
Enemies that are being damaged and touch the area again have their damage duration refreshed.

abilities.name: Rain Fire
abilities.description: Agni summons a meteor, dealing 135 [65% Intelligence] Magical Damage] . Agni can have up to 3 charges of this ability. Ignites Noxious Fumes.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Agni is
Slowed
by 50% while summoning a meteor.

abilities.name: Combustion
abilities.description: Hitting an enemy with a Basic Attack ugnutes them dealing 3 [+ 3% STR] Magical Damage over 3s and stacking 5 times. Flame Wave and Rain of Fire consume the ignite dealing 30 [+ 80% STR] Magical Damage

abilities.name: Rain Fire
abilities.description: Agni summons a meteor, dealing Magical Damage . You can have up to 3 charges of this ability. Ignites Noxious Fumes.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Agni is
Slowed
by 50% while summoning a meteor.

abilities.name: Aladdin Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deal Magical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
abilities.notes: Notes:

abilities.name: Three Wishes
abilities.description: Make 3 Wishes at any time in the match. Gain up to 2 charges of Genie's Strength every 15s. Wish: Wealth . Gain 250 gold. Gods Kills and Assists provide 100 more gold for 3 minutes. Wish: Immortality . While dead, wish to be instantly revived. Gain 75% Movement Speed for 10s when leaving the mountain. Wish: Power . Reset ability and item cooldowns. Gain 2 charges of Genie's Strength.

abilities.name: Kufic Invocation
abilities.description: Aladdin fires 5 Kufic symbols that deal 40 [45% Intelligence and 40% Strength] Magical Damage to enemies in a cone. Charge to narrow down the cone. When fully charged the symbols merge dealing 72 [81% Intelligence and 72% Strength] Magical Damage . When fully charged the symbol travels further and hits a larger area. Use a charge of Genie's Strength to send symbols back to Aladdin, dealing 40 [40% Intelligence and 45% Strength] Magical Damage when small or 72 [72% Intelligence and 81% Strength] Magical Damage when large.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Must have a charge of Genie's Strength when cast to be able to refire. You have 5 seconds to refire.
Subsequent hits deal 20% of the initial damage.
When sent back, the Kufic symbol(s) will fly to where Aladdin was when he refired.

abilities.name: Sultan's Grace
abilities.description: Aladdin Dashes forward dealing 70 [65% Intelligence and 55% Strength] Magical Damage to enemies you pass through. Deals 0.5% increased damage to enemies for each % Health below 50%. Use a charge of Genie's Strength to summon the Genie to unleash a flurry of 5 punches that 20 [15% Intelligence and 30% Strength] Magical Damage to enemies in front of Aladdin.
abilities.notes: Notes:

abilities.name: Agile Run
abilities.description: Aladdin Dashes forward. Dashing into a wall causes Aladdin to run along it before leaping to a location, dealing 60 [55% Intelligence and 40% Strength] Magical Damage to enemies in the landing area. Aladdin can use a charge of Genie's Strength to call the Genie to slam down at the landing location. Enemies take 20 [15% Intelligence and 30% Strength] Magical Damage and are knocked straight up .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
The angle Aladdin runs along the wall is determined by the angle Aladdin approaches the wall.
Aladdin can toggle using a charge of Genie's Strength until a landing location is selected.
Aladdin runs for 8.8 meters or until he reaches 5 meters in height. The wall run will always take 1.25 seconds.
Aladdin can wall run along all walls, structures, and player made deployables that he would normally collide with.

abilities.name: Into The Lamp
abilities.description: Aladdin throws the Lamp forward, dealing 80 [50% Strength and 65% Intelligence] Magical Damage stopping on the first enemy god hit. If successful, Aladdin and the enemy god are pulled into the lamp to challenge each other. They have their health restored to a minimum amount. Aladdin's non-ultimate cooldowns are reset. The target's non-ultimate cooldowns are halved. The lamp is left behind, allowing any god to enter the lamp and join the ongoing challenge.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Damage dealt by the initial hit cannot bring enemies lower than the health they would be restored to and cannot trigger item effects.
The fight lasts for 16s, after which everyone is kicked out of the lamp. An escape lamp appears at 8s into the fight.
The escape can open early when either the main Aladdin and fight target (hereby referred to as combatants) die, or if only 1 team remains in the lamp.
Entering the lamp or leaving the lamp requires interacting with the lamp. This interaction takes 0.5s and is interrupted by taking damage.
Non-combatants deal 25% reduced damage to and take 12.5% increased damage from combatants.
If while a fight is active a different Aladdin brings a target to the lamp, they become the new combatants. The previous combatants are now treated as non-combatants and the arena is resets its fight timer and closes the escape if it was active.
Gods outside the lamp cannot target gods inside the lamp. Gods inside the lamp cannot target gods outside the lamp.
Being kicked out of the lamp interrupts any currently firing ability.
Gods will be returned to the original locations and camera rotations when leaving the lamp.
Recalling and Aladdin's A04 are blocked from being used while inside the lamp.

abilities.name: Amaterasu Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deal 44 Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.
Has a 3 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1, 0.5, 1.5x damage and swing time.

abilities.name: Illuminating Strike
abilities.description: Amaterasu can basic attack an enemy 3 times to illuminate their weaknesses, causing them and other nearby enemies to take more damage from all sources.

abilities.name: Divine Presence
abilities.description: Amaterasu Heals herself for 15 [5% Intelligence] over 4s, and alternate between Gold and Red buff effects. Gold buff provides a Health Shield for 6s on activation, and a persistent Movement Speed Buff . Red buff provides an Attack Speed Buff for 6s on activation, and a persistent 14 [5% Intelligence] Strength and18 [3% Intelligence] Buff .

abilities.name: Heavenly Reflection
abilities.description: Amaterasu charges her mirror for 5s and decreases all damage she takes while charging by 7% [5% Intelligence] . She can reactivate the ability to a fire a projectile that deals 70 [60% Strength and 60% Intelligence] Physical Damage to enemies, increased by the Mirror's charge amount. Dealing and taking damage charges the Mirror. Base Damage is doubled when the mirror is fully charged.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile passes through and damages all enemies, and passes through enemies.

abilities.name: Glorious Charge
abilities.description: Amaterasu Silences enemies in front of her for 1s, then dashes forward and deals 80 [60% Strength] Physical Damage .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Pierces through and damages minions but stops on first god hit.

abilities.name: Dazzling Offensive
abilities.description: Amaterasu becomes CC Immune and then attacks 3 times to deal 100 [45% Strength and 35% Intelligence] Physical Damage to enemies in front of her each time. Attacks deal more damage and have bonus effects on each subsequent successful hit. 2nd hit deals 1.2x damage and Slows by 30% for 2s. 3rd hits deals 1.4x damage and Stuns for 1.5s.

abilities.name: Anhur Basic Attack
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Physical Damage to the first enemy hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

abilities.name: Enfeeble
abilities.description: Dealing Damage to enemies reduces their Physical Protection . Stacks up to 2 times.

abilities.name: Shifting Sands
abilities.description: Create a Pillar that Slows enemies around it and increases their damage taken from your basic attacks .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
The Pillar Impedes all Characters.
The Slow stacks with an additional Slow when closer to the Pillar.
Reactivate to destroy the Pillar early.

abilities.name: Impale
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Physical Damage to enemies. Displace the first god hit and Stun them if they hit a wall.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Enemies are Displaced in the direction the projectile is moving.
The Projectile passes through and damages minions, but stops on walls.
The enemy god displaced by this ability deals damage to enemies it collides with.

abilities.name: Disperse
abilities.description: Leap forward to deal Physical Damage and Displace enemies.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Enemies are Displaces up and away from your landing location.

abilities.name: Desert Fury
abilities.description: Channel to repeatedly fire projectiles that each deal Physical Damage . The final projectile deals a burst of Physical Damage .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Ability fires 4 times, plus the final prohectile, over 1.5 seconds.
These projectiles pass through and damage all enemies, and pass through walls.
Anhur is CC Immune while using this ability.

abilities.name: Anubis Basic Attack
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Magical Damage to the first enemy hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

abilities.name: The Scales
abilities.description: Gain bonus Lifesteal, Physical Protection, and Magical Protection. These bonuses increase as your health declines.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Gain 1 Stack of this buff for each 10% Health missing.
Bonuses cap at 18% bonus Lifesteal and 18 (Level 1) - 38 (Level 20) of each Protection at 80% lost HP.

abilities.name: Plague of Locusts
abilities.description: Channel to deal Magical Damage repeatedly to enemies in front of you.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
This ability hits 12 times over 2.5 seconds.
You move at 35/30/25/20/15% Reduced Movement Speed while Channeling.
You are Displacement Immune while Channeling.
This ability deals a total of 180/264/348/432/516 + 216/228/240/252/264% Intelligence magical damage.

abilities.name: Mummify
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Physical Damage and Stuns the first enemy god hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile ignores minions, and stops on walls.

abilities.name: Grasping Hands
abilities.description: Repeatedly deal Magical Damage and Slow enemies in the area.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
This ability hits 4 times over 1.5 seconds.
Slow is refreshed on each hit, and does not stack.
This ability deals a total of 80/180/260/340/420 + 140% Intelligence magical damage.

abilities.name: Death Gaze
abilities.description: Channel to deal a burst of Magical Damage to enemies in front of you, then repeatedly deal Magical Damage : to enemies in the same area. You are CC Immune : while Channeling.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Ability hits 24 times, plus the initial burst, over 2.4 seconds.
You are Rooted while Channeling.
This ability deals a total of 788/938/1088/1238/1388 + 570% Intelligence magical damage.

abilities.name: Aphrodite Basic Attack
abilities.description: Fires a projectile that deals 5 Magical Damage to the first enemy hit.

stats: 100% Strength or Inhand Power and 20% Intelligence

abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

abilities.name: Center of Attention
abilities.description: Aphrodite gains Physical and Magical Protection for each friendly or enemy god nearby.

abilities.name: Kiss
abilities.description: Aphrodite fire a kiss projectile at an allied god to link a Soul Mate , giving Aphrodite both increased Movement Speed and reduces Kiss's cooldown. If the kiss hits an enemy god, they take 40 [25% Intelligence] Magical Damage , are Stunned and her Soul Mate becomes Jealous , increasing their damage dealt. The Soul Mate gains 50% of Aphrodite's Mana Regen and 8% of her Protections.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If Aphrodite has been linked to a Soul Mate for 5s or more, switching to a new Soul Mate will cause both gods to become jealous.
Enemy gods in the path of a kiss that will create a Soul Mate will also take damage and be
Stunned
. The kiss will lock on to an ally god if they were in the area at the time of fire and not already linked.

abilities.name: Back Off!
abilities.description: Aphrodite deals 80 [85% Intelligence] Magical Damage] , Slows and Pushes away enemies around her. If she has a Soul Mate, they deal 80 [50% Intelligence] Magical Damage] , and Slow enemies hit. If an enemy is hit by both areas, they take reduced damage from the 2nd area.

abilities.name: Love Birds
abilities.description: Aphrodite fires a doves projectile that deals 15 [17% Intelligence] Magical Damage repeatedly over time to enemies hit. On fire, Aphrodite and her Soul Mate start Healing repeatedly for 10 [7% Intelligence Self, 5% Intelligence Ally] over time, and have their active cooldowns decreased per tick.

abilities.name: Undying Love
abilities.description: Aphrodite and her Soul Mate become Damage Immune , CC Immune , and gain the Jealousy effect for a short duration. Aphrodite can reactive to Leap to her Soul Mates location. Activating this ability instantly refreshed the cooldown on Love Birds.

abilities.name: Apollo Basic Attack
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals 48 Physical Damage to the first enemy hit.

abilities.name: Audacity
abilities.description: Gain a stack of Audacity for each successful Basic Attack on any enemy and for each successful damaging ability on Enemy gods. At 10 stacks you gain 100% Attack Speed and Increased Basic Attack Projectile Speed for his next 5 Basic Attacks.

abilities.name: So Beautiful
abilities.description: Send a projectile forward that deals 90 [90% STR] Physical Damage .

abilities.name: Serenade
abilities.description: Sing to Mesmerize all nearby enemies and gain additional protections . Any damage done breaks the Mesmerize

abilities.name: The Moves
abilities.description: Dash forward dealing 70 [60% STR] Physical Damage and Knocking aside all enemies. At the end of the Dash all nearby allies gain a Speed Buff and all nearby enemies are Slowed . Any enemy hit provides 1 stack of Audacity.

abilities.name: Across the Sky
abilities.description: Ride your chariot across the sky, choosing when to land. When descending you deal 70 [25% STR] Physical Damage every 0.15s for 0.6s, Knocking back enemies on the last tick. 2 Allies can join the Chariot ride by interacting with his takeoff location. Allies have until Apollo reaches max height to join Carrying an Ally costs additional mana
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Apollo is CC Immune while using this ability.

abilities.name: Audacity
abilities.description: Gain a stack of Audacity for each successful Basic Attack on any enemy and for each successful damaging ability on Enemy gods. At 10 stacks you a free usage of So Beautiful.

abilities.name: So Beautiful
abilities.description: Send a projectile forward that deals 60 [10% Item Health] Physical Damage . Enemies hit have their Attack Speed reduced. On first successful god or boss hit, send an Attack Speed buff to nearby allies.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Enhanced Cost: 20/25/30/35/40
Enhanced So Beautiful has a golden ability icon.

abilities.name: Serenade
abilities.description: Sing to Mesmerize all nearby enemies. Nearby allies gain a 50 health shield . While the shield holds they gain additional protections . Any damage done breaks the Mesmerize

abilities.name: Ares Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deal Magical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.

abilities.name: Blessed Armaments
abilities.description: Provide Strength and Intelligence in an Aura . Build Protections to increase Strength Aura. Build Cooldown Rate to increase Intelligence Aura. Both Auras increase with Level.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Provides more Strength as Ares builds protections. Provides more Intelligence as Ares builds Cooldown Reduction. Both increase with Level.

abilities.name: Shackles
abilities.description: Fire a Shackle projectile that deals Physical Damage , Slows , and stops on first enemy god hit. Shackled gods take repeating Magical Damage and are Crippled . Successfully hitting an enemy god allows you to fire another projectile and increases your Movement Speed . Up to 3 projectiles can be fired in this way.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
This projectile passes through and damages non-God enemies, and passes through walls. It stops on Gods.
Movement Speed buff stacks for each uniquely shackled god.
You have 2 seconds to fire another Shackle after successfully hitting an enemy god.

abilities.name: Call to Arms
abilities.description: You and allied gods around you gain increased Magical Protection, Physical Protection, Health Regen, and Basic Attack Damage . While this effect is active, each buffed god will be able to extend the duration and increase the effects of their buff by damaging enemy gods.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
The buff is extended by 4 seconds after hitting an enemy god 3 times.

abilities.name: Searing Flesh
abilities.description: Channel to deal Magical Damage repeatedly to enemies in front of you. Deals damage based on the enemies' maximum Health in addition to base and scaling damage. You are Displacement Immune while Channeling.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
You can fire your Shackles ability while channeling this ability, but no other attacks.
You are Displacement immune while Channeling.

abilities.name: No Escape
abilities.description: Begin Channeling and immediately attach a Chain to gods around you, dealing Magical Damage . At the end the of channel, Displace Chained gods toward you, then deal Magical Damage and Stun enemies around you. You are CC Immune and gain Damage Mitigation while Channeling.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Channel lasts 2.5 seconds. Enemy gods are Displaced toward you after 2.17 seconds of channeling.

abilities.name: Artemis Basic Attack
abilities.description: Fires a projectile that deals 0 Physical Damage to the first enemy hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

abilities.name: Still Target
abilities.description: Artemis deals 15% increased Basic Attack Damage to gods and 30% to minions that are affected by Crowd Control.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Artemis is able to detect nearby enemy Gods in stealth grass.

abilities.name: Transgressor's Fate
abilities.description: Artemis places a trap on the ground. Enemy gods that come in contact with it activate it, Rooting , Crippling , and repeatedly dealing 70 [60% Strength and 60% Intelligence] Physical Damage over 3s.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
A max. of 4 traps can be placed at the same time.
The trap deals damage every 1s for 3s.
Aspect
: You are
Healed
3 times over 3s when a trap is triggered.

abilities.name: Vengeful Assault
abilities.description: Artemis greatly increases her Movement Speed and Attack Speed . On activation, Artemis is cleansed of slows and becomes Slow Immune for 0.6s. While the buff is active, Artemis gains a charge each time she hits an enemy god with a basic hit. After reaching 4 charges they are consumed, extending the duration of the buff by 3s.

abilities.name: Supress the Insolent
abilities.description: Artemis fires a volley at a target area dealing 100 [75% Strength] Physical Damage and Slowing enemies.

abilities.name: Calydonian Boar
abilities.description: Artemis summons the great Calydonian Boar that charges the nearest enemy god. Deals 150 [90% Strength] Physical Damage and Stuns enemies. The boar is immune until it hits the first god and then continues to charge other gods for its lifetime. Artemis is CC Immune for 1.5s after activating this ability.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
The boar will basic attack minions if there are no nearby gods.

abilities.name: Athena Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deal Magical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.
Has a 3 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1, 1, 2x damage and swing time.
The final hit of the chain hits all targets in the area for 2x damage.

abilities.name: Reach
abilities.description: After each ability activation, your next basic attack becomes a projectile that deals Magical Damage .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Deals 125% Strength + 70% Intelligence damage to the first target hit, passes through and damages all enemies, and passes through walls.
This basic attack can Critically Strike.
This basic attack can trigger Item Effects.

abilities.name: Preemptive Strike
abilities.description: Dash forward to deal Magical Damage and Slow enemies after a brief buildup. Gain Physical Protection and Magical Protection when you hit an enemy god.

Notes:
Buildup takes 0.66 seconds.

abilities.description: Deal Magical Damage and Taunt enemies in front of you.

stats: 0.75/0.9/1.05/1.2/1.35 seconds + 0.2s per 150 Protections from Items, stacking up to 2 times

Notes:
Taunted enemies are Slowed by 25%.

abilities.description: Create a Phalanx of Soldiers that deals Magical Damage to enemies. After a delay they deal Magical Damage to enemies before disappearing.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
The delay between the first and second attack is 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Defender of Olympus
abilities.description: Channel and Shield an ally and grant them Movement Speed . When the channel completes, Teleport to their location. Deal Magical Damage to enemies upon landing.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Channel lasts for 3.34 seconds.
If your ally dies before your channel completes, you will still go to their location.
Athena is CC Immune while using this ability.

abilities.name: Awilix Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deals 44 Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.
Has a 5 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1, 0.75, 1.25x damage and swing time.

abilities.name: Initiative
abilities.description: If Awilix has not taken or dealt damage in the last 5s, Awilix gains 30% increased Basic Attack Power and Strength for 4s if she strikes an enemy first. The buff is extended by 2s if triggered by the leap from Summon Suku.

abilities.name: Summon Suku
abilities.description: Awilix mounts her Panther Suku, gaining Movement Speed but decreased strafe speed. Awilix may Leap off of Suku to deal 80 [80% Strength] Physical Damage in the target area.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Cancelling this ability before leaping will not trigger the cooldown.

abilities.name: Feather Step
abilities.description: Awilix flips over the last enemy she hits within 1.5s, Rooting , Crippling and dealing 40 [45% Strength] Physical Damage to them. The damage is increased by 50% based on the next attack in your Basic Attack progression. If the next attack is Awilix's third attack, Awilix will also hit all enemies in the area around the target.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Awilix is briefly untargetable while in the air.

abilities.name: Moonlight Charge
abilities.description: Suku comes to Awilix's aid, rushing forward dealing 90 [70% Strength] Physical Damage to any enemies. If hit from the side or behind, enemies are also Knocked Up . This ability can be used while riding Suku.

abilities.name: Gravity Surge
abilities.description: Awilix pulls the closest enemy god to her that is either Knocked Up or Leaping . The target god takes 170 [65% Strength] Physical Damage and is Stunned when they land. Awilix is then bathed in moonlight, gaining bonus Attack Speed, Basic Attack Power and Strength , as well as protection against Roots, Slows and Displacement for 6s.

abilities.name: Bacchus Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deal Magical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.

abilities.name: Drunk-O-Meter
abilities.description: Bacchus can get Drunk from Chugging to gain increased Strength, Intelligence, Physical Protection, and Magical Protection . Also adds additional effects to his abilities.

stats: +10 Strength, +25 Intelligence, +12% Physical Protection, +12% Magical Protection.

abilities.notes:
Notes:
Ranges from 0% to 100% Drunk.
Has no effect when under 30%.
Tipsy when between 30% to 59%.
Smashed when over 60%.
Drunkeness depletes over time at a rate of 2% per second.

abilities.name: Chug
abilities.description: Bacchus gets Drunk, Healing , gaining increased Strength and Intelligence , and his next basic attack deals additional 0 [35% Physical & Magical Protections] Magical Damage .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Empowered basic attack effect lasts until a target is succesfully hit.

abilities.name: Belly Flop
abilities.description: Bacchus Leaps forward to deal 80 [75% Strength and 30% Physical and Magical Protections] Magical Damage and Knocks up enemies. If Bacchus is tipsy, enemies are also Slowed after they landed.

Notes:
Enemies are Knocked straight up.

abilities.name: Belch of the Gods
abilities.description: Bacchus channels to deal 25 [17.5% Intelligence] Magical Damage repeatedly to enemies in front of Bacchus. The final hit will Stun if Bacchus is Tipsy or Smashed. Reduces enemy Healing. Bacchus is Displacement Immune while Channeling.

Notes:
This ability hits 3 times, plus the final hit, over 1.5 seconds.
Bacchus is Displacement Immune while Channeling.

abilities.name: Intoxicate

abilities.name: Baron Samedi Basic Attack
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Magical Damage to the first enemy hit.

stats: 100% Strength or Inhand Power and 20% Intelligence

abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

abilities.name: Hysteria
abilities.description: Damage applies Hysteria , granting Baron Samedi's abilities bonus effects when enough is applied. His team can also purchase Baron's Brew from the item store. Gods at Max Hysteria [70] deal 20% Reduced Damage to Baron Samedi. Baron's Brew can be thrown at enemies to apply Magical Damage and Hysteria. This buff stacks up to 3 times.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Hysteria drains at the rate of 2/s. This drain stops on the target for 5s when Baron Samedi applies Hysteria to them.

abilities.name: Vivid Gaze
abilities.description: Baron Samedi summons skulls that deal 85 [70% Intelligence] Magical Damage in an X shape. Deals 25% Magical Damage to enemies hit by the overlap. Hitting a god above 30 Hysteria applies a 20% [5% Physical Protection and 5% Magical Protection] Strength, Intelligence, and Attack Speed Reduction buff.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Vivid Gaze will trigger its Hysteria effect if its own damage brings targets above the Hysteria Threshold.

abilities.name: Consign Spirit
abilities.description: Baron Samedi calls spirits that deal 65 [80% Intelligence] Magical Damage to enemies in an area. Hitting a god Heals nearby allies for 30 +2% [10% Cooldown Rate] Missing Health . Hitting a god above 30 Hysteria makes the heal apply a 25% Speed Buff and Slow Immunity .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Allies within 8.8m of Baron Samedi of the center of Consign Spirits will receive the heal.

abilities.name: Wrap It Up
abilities.description: Baron Samedi throws a snake that constricts enemy gods, Slowing them to a Root . Constricted gods take 70 [50% Intelligence] Magical Damage over 1.75s. Minions take a tick of Magical Damage when the snake passes through them. Hitting a god above 30 Hysteria causes the snake to explode when it Roots, applying a Mesmerize to nearby enemies.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Enemies must be at or above 30 Hysteria when Wrap It Up hits to trigger its Hysteria effect.
The snake deals damage every 0.4375s, for a total of 5 ticks.

abilities.name: Life of the Party
abilities.description: Baron Samedi opens a coffin that Vortexes enemies towards Baron Samedi. Gods Vortexed into the Coffin take 125 [55% Intelligence] + 10% Max Health [2% Physical Protection and Magical Protection] Magical Damage and are Stunned . The Vortex deals 15 [7% Intelligence] Magical Damage every 0.5s. God above 30 Hysteria are Vortexed with more intensity.
abilities.notes: Notes:

abilities.name: Bellona Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you. You have 4 different weapons to attack with, depending on the most recent ability used.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.
Bellon remains in her current basic attacks until she goes 7 seconds without dealing or taking damage.
Greatsword has a 3 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1, 1, 1.5x damage and swing time, with no special effects.
Sword and Shield has a 3 hit chain. Attacks in order of 0.5, 1 , 1x damage and swing time and provides 1 block stack ever enemy god hit. Max 3 stacks.
Hammer has a 3 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1.5, 1, 1.5x damage and 1.5, 1, 1.25x swing time. Hits all enemies in range of each attack.
Scourge has a 3 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1, 0.5, 1x damage and swing time, and heals you on every successful hit.

abilities.name: Master of War
abilities.description: Gain stacking Movement Speed when you hit or are hit by basic attacks. Gain additional effects depending on the basic attack weapon used.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Sword and Shield gains Physical Protection and Magical Protection per stack.
Hammer gains % Strength per stack
Scourge gains Attack Speed per stack.
All basic attacks still gain the Movement Speed per stack.

abilities.name: Shield Bash
abilities.description: Dash forward to deal Physical Damage and Slow enemies. Gain 1 Block Stack for each enemy god hit. Change to Sword and Shield basic attacks.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Block absorbs all damage from one basic attack per stack.
Bellona's Blocks also reflect back a portion of the blocked damage to enemies around her. This effect scales off her Physical Protection and Magical Protection.

abilities.name: Bludgeon
abilities.description: Spin to deal Physical Damage to enemies around you, then Slam to deal Physical Damage to enemies in an area. Change to Hammer basic attacks.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Final Slam damage increases by 0.35 for each enemy god hit by the Spin attack.

abilities.name: Scourge
abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage and Disarm enemies. Change to Scourge basic attacks.

abilities.name: Eagle's Rally
abilities.description: Leap forward to deal Physical Damage and Stun enemies. You and allied Gods that remain in the area gain Strength, Intelligence, Physical Protection, and Magical Protection . You are CC Immune : while Leaping.

abilities.name: Agni Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deals Magical Damage to an enemy in front of Cabrakan.

stats: 100% Strength or Inhand Power and 20% Intelligence

abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

abilities.name: Shadow Zone
abilities.description: Cabrakan and his allies take reduced damage. Cabrakan deals increased damage to enemies that damage him or his nearby allies.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
The aura provides Cabrakan 1% additional Mitigations for every 100 Protections from items he has.

abilities.name: Seismic Crush
abilities.description: Cabrakan becomes enraged, increasing his Movement Speed and Attack Speed . While active, his next Basic Attack will Stun and deal bonus 80 [45% Intelligence and 75% Strength] Magical Damage . Cabrakan gains Haste and Immunity to Slow and Roots while this effect is active.

abilities.name: Refraction Shield
abilities.description: Cabrakan clashes his shields, unleashing a concussive blast that deals 70 [55% Intelligence] Magical Damage] . Taking damage charges his shields, granting Protections . At Max Stacks, Cabrakan gains access to Enhanced Refraction Shield on a separate cooldown. Enhanced Refraction Shield's concussive blast deals 70 [75% Intelligence] Magical Damage] and Stuns enemies. Restores Mana per enemy hit by Refraction Shield, or Health per enemy hit by Enhanced Refraction Shield.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Cannot gain access to Enhanced Refraction Shield when it is on cooldown.

abilities.name: Tremors
abilities.description: Cabrakan repeatedly slams the ground, Trembling and dealing 18 [40% Intelligence] Magical Damage to enemies every .5s while pulling them toward himself in a Vortex . Cabrakan can refire for a stronger quake that deals 50 [55% Strength] Magical Damage and Cripples enemies, and incurs an increased cooldown.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Maximum channel duration of 10 seconds.
Cost incurred for each slam.

abilities.name: Tectonic Shift
abilities.description: Cabrakan stomps the ground to create a fissure that deals 150 [65% Intelligence and 95% Strength] Magical Damage] to enemies in its path. From the fissure, five pieces of earth erupt to form a wall. Cabrakan can refire the ability to destroy all pieces at once.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Wall pieces can last up to 15 seconds if not destroyed.
Wall pieces each have 3 Hit Points, an enemy Basic Attack will deal 1 Hit Point per hit.
Cabrakan's basic attacks will deal 3 Hit Points, instantly destroying a piece of the wall.

abilities.name: Cerberus Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deals Magical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.
Has a 3 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1, 0.8, 0.8x damage and swing time

abilities.name: Spirit of Death
abilities.description: Any time a nearby enemy god is Healed, that Heal is reduced by 40% and you receive 60% + 1% per level of the Heal. The amount stolen is based off of the base heal effect and does not include any increase or reduction applied. Severing an enemy's soul increases Healing stolen from them by 20% for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Paralyzing Spit
abilities.description: Spit venom with you snake tail that passes through enemies dealing Magical Damage. If you dog heads are alert, they also spit venom Each head is alerted by landing basic attacks and all are alerted after Ghastly Breath is used When all heads are alert, the snake tail projectile Stuns targets. The stun is 75% less effective within 2.5 meters.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Each projectile that hits the same target deals 20% less damage.

abilities.name: Ghastly Breath
abilities.description: Your heads release a cone of noxious breath dealing Magical Damage repeatedly to enemies in front of you. Enemies hit have their Magical Protection reduced up to 3 times Enemies in the center of the breath are Slowed up to 3 times Firing this ability immediately alerts all of your heads Killing souls with this ability enhances its damage by 15% for the remaining duration up to 3 times. At 3 stacks, the entire area immediately applies 3 stacks of the Slow.

abilities.name: Soul Expulsion
abilities.description: Leap forward dealing Magical Damage to enemies and severing their souls when you land. Killing a soul Heals you and reduces Soul Expulsion's cooldown by 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Stygian Torment
abilities.description: Raise all enemy Gods into the air, severing their souls and dealing Magical Damage to them before pulling them in front of you. Using this ability alerts all of your heads
abilities.notes:
Notes:
This ability can be cleansed

abilities.name: Ghastly Breath
abilities.description: Your heads release a cone of noxious breath dealing Magical Damage repeatedly to enemies in front of you. Enemies hit have their Magical Protection reduced up to 3 times Enemies in the center of the breath are Slowed up to 3 times Firing this ability immediately alerts all of your heads Killing souls with this ability enhances its damage by 15% for the remaining duration up to 3 times. At 3 stacks, the entire area immediately applies 3 stacks of the Slow

abilities.name: Soul Expulsion
abilities.description: Leap forward dealing Magical Damage to enemies and severing their souls when you land. Killing a soul reduces Soul Expulsion's cooldown by 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Stygian Torment
abilities.description: Knock Up nearby enemy gods, severing their souls and dealing Magical Damage to them before pulling them in front of you. Using this ability alerts all of your heads
abilities.notes:
Notes:
This ability can be cleansed

abilities.name: Cernunnos Basic Attack
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Magical Damage to the first enemy hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

abilities.name: Heavy Glaive
abilities.description: With each basic attack, deal bonus Physical Damage to enemies in melee range.

abilities.name: Shifter of Seasons
abilities.description: Activate to toggle between Spring, Summer, Fall, or Winter basic attack bonuses. These empower your basic attacks with one of the following effects: Self Healing , Bonus Damage , Protection Reduction or a Slow .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
This effect is always active once ranked.
Summer Season basic attacks deal Physical Damage if you have more Strength or Magical Damage if you have more Intelligence.

abilities.name: Bramble Blast
abilities.description: Fire an exploding projectile. The first enemy hit with the projectile is Rooted . The explosion deals Physical Damage , then creates a Bramble area that repeatedly deals Physical Damage .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops and explodes on the first enemy hit. Projectile stops and explodes on walls.
Bramble area hits 10 times over 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Horn Charge
abilities.description: Dash forward and deal Physical Damage to all enemies hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Dash passes through all enemies.
You can cancel this ability at any time.

abilities.name: The Wild Hunt
abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to all enemies in the area and Polymorph enemy Gods.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Polymorphed Enemies are Silenced, Disarmed, Slowed, and transformed to look like harmless animals.

abilities.name: Chaac Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.
Has a 3 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1, 0.5, 1.5x damage and swing time.

abilities.name: Overflow
abilities.description: After 5 succesfull basic attacks, the next ability you activate has lower Cooldown, costs 0 Mana, and Heals you.

abilities.name: Thunder Strike
abilities.description: Throw an Axe that deals Physical Damage to enemies in thew area. The Axe remains deployed to empower Torrent or Rain Dance.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Reactivate to destroy the Axe.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to enemies around you and gain Physical Protection and Magical Protection for each enemy hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If you Dash, you will still do the area attack upon reaching the Axe.
Minions provide 1 stack, Gods provide 2 stacks.

abilities.name: Rain Dance
abilities.description: Create a Rain Storm that Heals you over time. While healing, the Rain Storm around you Slows and reduces the Attack Speed of enemies .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Heals 8 times over 6 seconds.
If the Axe is deployed, create a Rain Storm at the Axe's location as well.
Enemies in both Rain Storms are Slowed and Debuffed for twice as much.

abilities.name: Storm Call
abilities.description: Channel and gain Damage Mitigation while Channeling, then deal Physical Damage , Displace , and Silence enemies around you. You are CC Immune while Channeling.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Enemies are Displaced straight up.

abilities.name: Cupid Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deals Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

abilities.name: Lovestruck
abilities.description: Hitting a Basic Attack grants a stack, or 2 stacks if the target is an enemy god. Heart Bomb, Share The Love and Fields of Love always consume up to 8 stacks on use, granting them additional Damage Healing and bonus effects.

abilities.name: Heart Bomb
abilities.description: Cupid fires an arrow of love, dealing 50 [80% Strength and 55% Intelligence] Physical Damage to the first enemy hit and Slowing them. After 3 s, the enemy's heart explodes, dealing 50 [80% Strength and 55% Intelligence] Physical Damage to all enemies within the radius. If Cupid has 8 stacks of Lovestruck, all enemies in the area are Stunned .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Deals additional damage to minions.

abilities.name: Share The Love
abilities.description: Cupid lobs an explosive bomb at a location that detonates after 0.75s, dealing 80 [65% Strength and 35% Intelligence] Physical Damage to all enemies hit. When the bomb explodes, 3 hearts spawn around the location, Healing 20 [7% Intelligence] and restoring 20 [5% Intelligence] Mana to any ally that picks them up. If Cupid has 8 stacks of Lovestruck, the heart also provides a temporary 5 [10% Strength] Strength and 5 [5% Intelligence] Intelligence Buff .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
The heart persists for 8s.
When Cupid or an ally pick up a heart, Cupid gains a stack of Lovestruck.
If an ally picks up the heart, Cupid
Heals for 60% of the value and also restore Mana.

abilities.name: Flutter
abilities.description: Cupid dashes forward quickly, leaving a behind trail that increases all allies' Attack and Movement Speed .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Cupid also gains
Attack Speed
after dashing, which is active for the same duration as the trail and stacks with all the trail's buff.
The
Attack Speed buff
only scales with Attack Speed from items.

abilities.name: Fields of Love
abilities.description: Cupid fires a volley of arrows in an area, Slowing and Crippling all enemies inside. The arrows grow for 2s before exploding, dealing 200 [100% Strength and 75% Intelligence] Physical Damage and Mesmerizing all enemies inside the area, while Healing all allies Healing 60 [20% Intelligence] . If Cupid has 8 stacks of Lovestruck, enemies are Stunned instead of Mesmerized .

abilities.name: Danzaburou Basic Attack
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Physical Damage to the first enemy hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

abilities.name: Dishonest Duplication
abilities.description: Danzaburou has a 5% + 0.5% per level + 0.5% Intelligence chance of spawning a clone of himself with each basic attack hitting an enemy.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Clones last for 3s, deal 10% of Danzaburou's Basic Attack Damage and take 300% increased Damage.
Clones last 3s, deal 12.5%/13.75%/15%/16.25%/17.5% of Danzaburou's Basic Attack Damage and take 300% increased Damage.
Clones have a 5% + 0.25% Per Level chance of spawning a clone.
Clones target the enemy that was hit when they were created.

abilities.name: Fool's Gold
abilities.description: Danzaburou rolls out 3 bags that deal 95 [90% Strength and 65% Intelligence] Physical Damage to enemies hit and then explode, dealing 30 [20% Strength and 40% Intelligence] Physical Damage . They stop on enemy gods, Trembling them and dropping a coin. Coins can be picked up by yourself or allied gods to provide you 10 gold.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Subsequent hits of bags or explosions on the same enemy deal 15% damage.

abilities.name: Alluring Spirits
abilities.description: Danzaburou drinks some sake, Healing for 15 [5% Intelligence] Health every 0.5s for 1.5s] before throwing the bottle, dealing 90 [70% Strength and 40% Intelligence] Physical Damage to enemies hit. On landing, the bottle applies a stacking Slow to enemy gods. On reaching 3 stacks, they are Taunted towards the bottle.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
This ability does 40% Bonus Damage to Jungle Monsters.
The inner circle deals damage on landing while the entire area slows.
The bottle can be broken early with enemy basic attacks.
Taunt is not affected by Diminishing Returns.
If the Taunted enemy takes more than 30% of their max. Health, the taunt ends early.

abilities.name: Tanuki Trickery
abilities.description: Danzaburou creates a field where he gains Movement Speed, Slow Immunity, his Basic Attack Penalty is removed, and his Dishonest Duplication chance is doubled . When Danzaburou leaves the area, it disappears and Danzaburou transforms into a leaf while decoys mimic his movements. Enemies in the field are Slowed . As a leaf, Danzaburou gains increased Movement Speed, Slow Immunity and a buff that causes his next Basic Attack to deal 20 [100% Intelligence and 55% Strength] Physical Damage .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Taking damage or attacking while in leaf form will end it early however there is a brief delay before this can happen on first transforming.

abilities.name: Uproarious Rocket
abilities.description: Danzaburou fires a rocket that locks onto enemy gods or can reactivate this ability to become the rocket himself! The rocket deals 300 [100% Strength and 70% Intelligence] Physical Damage , Stuns the first enemy god hit and explodes, dealing 225 [50% Strength and 80% Intelligence] Physical Damage . The final projectile deals a burst of Physical Damage .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Danzaburou is Rooted and CC Immune while Channeling and can only aim within 180 degrees.
The rocket pierces through and damages minions but stops on first god hit.
Danzaburou is immune to damage while in rocket form.
Danzaburou can cancel this ability while a rocket to transform back, sending out the rocket directly ahead.

abilities.name: Fenrir Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.

abilities.name: Unbound Runes
abilities.description: Fenrir gains Runes on succesful basic attacks or from activating abilities. If he has 5 Runes, activating each ability will be granting additional effects.

abilities.name: Unchained
abilities.description: Leap forward to deal Physical Damage . At 5 Runes, Stun all enemies in the area, then all Runs are consumed. Gain 3 Runes on succesful hit if not at 5 Runes.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Hitting an enemy god reduces the Cooldown of this ability by 30%.

abilities.name: Seething Howl
abilities.description: Gain increased Strength, Attack Speed, and Lifesteal . At 5 Runes, allied Gods around you also gain increased Lifesteal. Does not consume Runes. Gain 3 Runes if not at 5 Runes.

abilities.name: Brutalize
abilities.description: Leap forward, Channel and grab onto an enemy, and deal Physical Damage repeatedly to all enemies in the area. At 5 Runes, the Strength scaling is increased, then all Runes are consumed. Gain 1 Rune per succesful hit if not at 5 Runes.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
This ability can critically strike.

abilities.name: Ragnarok
abilities.description: Activate to become immense, gain increased Movement Speed, Physical Protection, and Magical Protection . Your next basic attack grabs and enemy God, allowing you to Displace and carry them to any position. Gain 5 Runes. You are CC Immune for the duration.

abilities.name: Ganesha Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deal Magical Damage to an enemy in front of Ganesha.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit. Has a 5 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1.05, 0.8, 0.8, 1.5, 0.95x damage and swing time.

abilities.name: Good Fortune
abilities.description: Any time you deal the killing blow, the nearest allied god receives the credit and you receive the rewards for an assist instead plus a bonus amount of gold. In addition, your assist range and the time before you lose assist credit is increased.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Bonus gold: 50 per gifted god kill.

abilities.name: Turn of Fate
abilities.description: Send a curse forward dealing Magical Damage to enemies it passes through. For each enemy hit, all nearby allied gods gain Bonus Damage. Enemy gods are marked for 5s. Any Hard Crowd Control effect consumes the mark to deal bonus Magical Damage.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Bonus Damage buff stacks up to 5 times. Minions grant 1 stack and Gods grant 2.

abilities.name: ohm
abilities.description: Rise into the lotus position Silencing enemies in front of you and increasing protections of nearby allied gods. Ganesha gains an additional 50% of the protections he provides You are Displacement Immune while channeling
abilities.notes:
Notes:
you are slowed by 15% while channeling

abilities.name: Remove Obstacles
abilities.description: Dash forward dealing Magical Damage to enemy minions you pass through and stopping on enemy gods, holding them in place before Knocking them up. While Dashing you pass through ultimate player made walls and destroy non-ultimate player made walls.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Damage dealt to enemy gods is split between 3 hits
You pass through but do not destroy ally walls
You cannot cancel while Dashing but you can on contact with an enemy god

abilities.name: Dharmic Pillars
abilities.description: Summon 4 Great Pillars to imprison your enemies. Enemies that pass the field between each pillar take an initial hit of Magical Damage, are Slowed, and have their Protections Reduced. Enemies continue to take Magical Damage if they stay in the field Minions take 40% reduced damage from this ability

abilities.name: Geb Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deals Magical Damage to an enemy in front of you.

stats: 100% Strength or Inhand Power and 20% Intelligence

abilities.notes:
Notes:
If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit

abilities.name: Hard as Rock
abilities.description: Geb cannot take more than 20% of his Max HP from a single attack. Enemy god basic attack damage taken is decreased by 5% and Critical Strike bonus damage taken is decreased by 65%.

abilities.name: Roll Out
abilities.description: Geb charges forward, stopping on the first enemy hit. Enemies hit take 100 [50% Intelligence] Magical Damage and are Slowed . Geb's speed increases over 3s before becoming CC Immune and causing enemy gods hit to be Knocked Back . After 3s this ability can be refired to Leap forward, dealing 100 [50% Intelligence] Magical Damage and Knocking Up enemies hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
As Geb's speed increases, the damage of this ability also increases from 75% to 100%.
Total Charge durations lasts 6s.

abilities.name: Shock Wave
abilities.description: Geb creates a shock wave in a cone,  dealing 100 [50% Intelligence] Magical Damage and Knocking Up enemies hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Damage decreased with distance, down to 80% at max range.

abilities.name: Stone Shield
abilities.description: Geb provides himself or an allied god a 50 Health Shield . Allies also gain Hard as Rock buff benefits while the Shield is active.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
The Shield also cleanses any CC effects when applied.

abilities.name: Cataclysm
abilities.description: Geb pulls apart the Earth, dealing 120 Magical Damage and Stunning enemy gods hit. Targets take additional damage based on their current Health.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Geb is
CC Immune
while using this ability.

abilities.name: Guan Yu Basic Attack
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Physical Damage to the first enemy hit. If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit. Has a 4 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1, 1, 1.3, 1.75x damage and swing time. The 3rd swing in his chain hits all targets in the damage area.

abilities.name: Battle Fervor
abilities.description: Gain stacks of Fervor when dealing or taking damage. Fervor provides Attack Speed per stack. At Maximum Stacks it provides more Attack Speed.

abilities.name: Conviction
abilities.description: Heals nearby allies for Health. Healing allied gods reduces Guan Yu and his allies cooldowns. Can be cast during any of Guan Yu's other abilities. If Guan Yu would benefit from the Cooldown Reduction, but it was used during the cast of another ability, that ability will receive the cooldown reduction when it goes on cooldown.

abilities.name: Warrior's Will
abilities.description: Dash forward, dealing Physical Damage to and Slowing enemies you pass through. Hitting enemy gods reduces your cooldowns.

abilities.name: Taolu Assault
abilities.description: Swing your blade in a flurry, dealing Physical Damage repeatedly and stealing their protections up to 3 times. Damages 10 times in 3s Every 25% Attack Speed causes it to damage 1 additional time

abilities.name: Cavalry Charge
abilities.description: Mount a warhorse gaining crowd control immunity. Strike enemies while riding dealing Physical Damage. Dismount with a final swing that also Stuns all enemies hit. Enemies hit by previous strikes take increased damage from the strike. This stacks Swing faster as you gain Attack Speed

abilities.name: Hades Basic Attack
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Magical Damage to the first enemy hit. Applies Blight.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

abilities.name: Blight
abilities.description: Your attacks and abilities apply Blight. Blighted enemies have reduced Strength and Intelligence , and receive additional effects from your abilities.

abilities.name: Death From Below
abilities.description: Leap forward to deal Magical Damage to enemies. Slows Blighted enemies. Applies Blight.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Enemies take reduced damage if hit by multiple explosions.

abilities.name: Shroud of Darkness
abilities.description: Silence enemies in front of you. Fear Blighted enemies. Applies Blight.

stats: 0.2s per 125 Protections from Items, stacking up to 2 times

abilities.notes:
Notes:
Enemies are feared in a random direction away from Hades.

abilities.name: Devour Souls
abilities.description: Deal Magical Damage to enemies around you. Blighted enemies explode when hit, dealing additional Magical Damage to them and enemies around them. Heal yourself and your allies around you per Blighted enemy hit.

abilities.name: Pillar of Agony
abilities.description: Channel to repeatedly deal Magical Damage and repeatedly Vortex enemies around you, reducing your abilities cooldowns for each hit. While channeling, you may use another ability, but only once. Reduce the Physical and Magical Protections of Blighted enemies damaged. You are CC Immune while Channeling and gain increased Physical Protection and Magical Protection .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Vortexes slow targets moving away from the source, or speed up targets moving toward it.
This Vortex increases in intensity as the channel time progresses.
Channel times is 4 seconds. Hits 8 times.
You are Rooted while Channeling.

abilities.name: Hecate Basic Attack
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Magical Damage to the first enemy hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

abilities.name: Mythic Ritual
abilities.description: Interact with allied Structures to channel and create a buff area that provides Health and Mana regeneration to Gods in the area. Interact with allied Gods only if they have recently earned a kill to channel and increase their Strength and Intelligence
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Channel time is 2 seconds.
Can move while channeling. Channel will not be interrupted if the target or Hecate get out of range.
Structure buff area has infinite duration. Only 1 Structure can be buffed at a time. If a new one is buffed the previous one will lose the effect.
Must complete the ritual on a player within 30 seconds of that player getting a kill.

abilities.name: Triplicate Form
abilities.description: Hecate fires a projectile that alternates between Power Form and Hex Form on each activation. Power Form deals 70 [75% Intelligence] Magical Damage and Marks enemies to take 10 [3% Intelligence] bonus Magical Damage when damaged by another god. Hex Form deals 70 [75% Intelligence] Magical Damage and Mesmerizes enemies hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectiles both pass through and damage all enemies, and pass through walls.
Both projectiles linger at max range for 1s and can still hit enemies. Each projectile can only hit an enemy 1 time.
Only damage dealt by the basic attacks and abilities of gods triggers the bonus damage from the Mark.

abilities.name: Spell Eater
abilities.description: Hecate creates a Sigil that charges up when Gods activate abilities in a large area. Hecate can reactivate the sigil to deal 70 [40% Magical Damage] to enemies in the targeted area. Damage can increase by up to 70% at full Charges.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Damage is increased by 10 % per Charge.
Max Charge of 12.
Max Damage is 220% base damage and scaling.

abilities.name: Repel Magic
abilities.description: Hecate locks on to herself or an allied god to grant them a Magical Shield and deal 85 [85% Intelligence Magical Damage] to enemies around them. Activating this ability increases Hecate's Movement Speed and provides Spell Eater with 3 charges instead of 1.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Magical Shields are HP shields that only absorb Magical Damage. They stack with HP Shields.

abilities.name: Open the Gates
abilities.description: Hecate opens two portals that deals 280 [85% Intelligence] Magical Damage to enemies after a delay. Gods who are hit are Stunned , and then Displaced to the opposite portal. You and allied gods can interact with the portals to Teleport between them.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
One Portal is always opened right in front of you, the other is opened at a targeted area.
Enemies that cleanse or immune the Stun will not be Teleported.
The initial delay is 1.5s, the Interactable Lifetime is 30s.
You and allies can interact with the portals any number of times.

abilities.name: Spell Eater
abilities.description: Create a Sigil that decreases enemy god ability damage done in a large area for 4s. A projectile is fired when enemy gods activate abilities, exploding and dealing 180 [20% INT] Magical Damage to enemies in the targeted area

abilities.name: Hercules Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.
Has a 3 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1, 1, 1.5x damage and swing time.

abilities.name: Apotheosis
abilities.description: Hercules gains Strength when enemy gods damage him. This stacks up to 3 times and lasts 5s. Additionally, hitting a target with an ability lets Hercules gain a stack toward achieving Apeothesis, or 2 stacks from his Ultimate. At 4 stacks, he enters an empowered state that immediately subtracts 2s from his active cooldowns and provides addtional Strength, Protections and Cleaving basic attacks for the duration.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Each activation of an ability can only grant 1 stack.
Strength from Apotheosis is equal to 1 Stack from taking damage from Gods.
While empowered Hercules grows in size.

abilities.name: Driving Strike
abilities.description: Hercules dashes forward, dealing 90 [85% Strength] Physical Damage , Stunning and Pushing enemies hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Hercules is Displacement Immune for the duration of the dash

abilities.name: Earthshaker
abilities.description: Hercules creates a rift that deals 85 [65% Strength] Physical Damage to enemies in front of you. Enemies hit by the end area are Pulled to Hercules.

abilities.name: Mitigate Wounds
abilities.description: Hercules immediately heals heals himself for 45 , and gains Attack Speed and Protections for 4s. At the end of the duration Hercules heals himself again for a percentage of damage taken during this effect.

abilities.name: Excavate
abilities.description: Hercules hurls a boulder at a location, Displacing enemies straight up at the landing spot. The boulder then rolls and bounces off walls, dealing 280 [100% Strength] Physical Damage to enemies hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Hercules is CC Immune while using this ability.

abilities.name: Mitigate Wounds
abilities.description: Immediately Heal yourself , and gain Protections for 4s. While the Buff is active, each time you or a nearby ally gets hit with a Basic Attack, you gain a stack. At the end of the duration, Heal yourself and nearby allies per stack

abilities.name: Hua Mulan Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.
Has a 3 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1, 1, 1.5x damage and swing time.
Final swing hits all enemies within its range.

abilities.name: Training Arc
abilities.description: Hua Mulan utilizes her Sword, Spear and Bow with her abilities to gain Skill towards them by damaging enemies. Her expertise in each weapon enhances their respective abilities. Additionally, she gains two unique benefits: Training Arc reduces the cooldown of Hua Mulan's next non-ultimate ability. Training Grounds a consumable which provides team-wide utility.

abilities.name: Cross Strike
abilities.description: Hua Mulan strikes twice with her sword, dealing 75 [30% Strength] Physical Damage to all enemies hit. Skilled: Gains an Attack Speed increase after using this ability. Adept: Performs a third strike in an extended cone in front of Hua Mulan, dealing 75 [30% Strength] Physical Damage . Mastered: Permanently gain Attack Speed .

abilities.name: Spear Thrust
abilities.description: Hua Mulan thrusts her spear forward, striking enemies in front of her, Slowing them and dealing 100 [35% Strength] Physical Damage . Skilled: Heals for up to 3 enemies hit. Adept: Strikes as second time with increased range, dealing bonus 20 [10% Strength] Physical Damage if the same enemy is hit twice. Mastered: Permanently gains Strength .

abilities.name: Grapple
abilities.description: Hua Mulan fires an arrow with a rope attached. If it hits an enemy god, it Stuns them, dealing 90 [50% Strength] Physical Damage , and Pulls them toward Hua Mulan while she Dashes at them and follows it up with a slash for 50 [20% Strength] Physical Damage . Skilled: Hua Mulan gains a Protections buff after hitting an enemy god. Adept: Dash can now target walls. Mastered: Permanently gains Movement Speed and Protections .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Stun is unaffected by Diminishing Returns.
Hua Mulan is immune to crowd control while pulling a God.

abilities.name: Divine Mastery
abilities.description: Hua Mulan unleashes her entire arsenal, Dashing forward with sword slashes that deal 80 [60% Strength] Physical Damage and Root enemies. Hua Mulan follows this up by using divine energy to Knock Up enemies with her spear, dealing 100 [40% Strength] Physical Damage . She finishes with a powerful projectile attack from her bow, dealing 175 [60% Strength] Physical Damage .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
MASTERED SWORD
: Turn up to 90° during the forward dash.
MASTERED SPEAR
: Knocking up enemies adds 3 seconds to their active cooldowns.
MASTERED BOW
: Arrow travels 40% faster.
Dealing damage with any part of this ability grants Skill towards the corresponding weapon.
Gain Protections for the duration of this ability.
This ability can be cancelled early.

abilities.name: Hun Batz Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.
Has a 5 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 1.5x damage and swing time.

abilities.name: Infused Strikes
abilities.description: After using an ability, Hun Batz's next Basic Attack will deal 1.2x damage and grants Hun Batz a stacking Strength buff on successful hit. Stacks up to 4 times.

abilities.name: Somersault
abilities.description: Hun Batz leaps forward, dealing 65 [60% Strength] Physical Damage and Slowing enemies in the area where Hun Batz takes off and where he lands. Enemies hit by both areas take 25% damage from the 2nd hit.

abilities.name: Overhand Smash
abilities.description: Hun Batz channels for a short duration. At the end of the channel, he deals 75 [85% Strength] Physical Damage to enemies in front of him and applies a Physical Protection debuff. While channeling, Hun Batz is Displacement Immune and Immune to strafe and backpedal movement penalties .

abilities.name: Sacred Monkey
abilities.description: Hun Batz throws a projectile monkey that deals 80 [70% Strength] Physical Damage to any enemies it hits. After hitting, it will bounce to nearby enemies applying a Mark to only the most recently hit enemy. Hun Batz can reactivate this ability to Teleport to the Marked enemy.

abilities.name: Fear No Evil
abilities.description: Hun Batz creates a Totem that repeatedly Fears and deals 35 [10% Strength] Physical Damage to all enemies around it. Hits every 0.25 seconds. Fear can only last a maximum of 1 second.
abilities.notes: Notes:

abilities.name: Izanami Basic Attack
abilities.description: Izanami throws a piercing projectile that deals Physical Damage to all enemies hit. The projectile returns to Izanami after reaching its max range or hitting a wall, dealing Physical Damage to any enemies hit on the way back.

stats: 35% Strength or Inhand Power and 7% Intelligence

abilities.name: Death Draws Nigh
abilities.description: Izanami gains Physical Penetration and Intelligence for each1% of your Max Health taken as damage. Each stack fades 10 seconds after the damage was taken. Stack count cannot drop below the percentage of your current missing health.

abilities.name: Sickle Storm
abilities.description: Izanami increases her Attack Speed for 6 seconds, but her Basic Attacks no longer piece enemies or return to her. Basic Attacks deal Bonus Damage to Structures. Applies a stacking Bleed to enemies hit.

abilities.name: Spectral Projection
abilities.description: Izanami sends forth a spectral projection of herself, dealing Physical Damage and Slowing to all enemies in a line.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Spectral Projection passes through walls.
Can be cast without breaking Stealth from Fade Away.

abilities.name: Fade Away
abilities.description: Izanami descends into the underworld, becoming Stealthed , and Leap from your current position. Gain Movement Speed while in Stealth.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Sickle Storm and Spectral Projection can be used without breaking Stealth.

abilities.name: Dark Portal
abilities.description: Izanami summons a dark portal which deals instant Physical Damage and Physical Damage over time . Enemies are also Silenced and Slowed .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Slowing and Damage over time effects start strong, and fade away over 2s.
Slow is not affected by diminishing returns.

abilities.name: Jing Wei Basic Attack
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Physical Damage to the first enemy hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

abilities.name: Rapid Reincarnation
abilities.description: When exiting the fountain, fly into the sky and soar over obstacles. Select a landing location early or descend when the duration expires.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
This abilty can be canceled before ascending.
Jing Wei will not ascend if firing basic attacks when leaving the fountain.
Jing Wei is fully CC Immune during buildup, ascent, flight, and descent.

abilities.name: Persistent Gust
abilities.description: Create a Gust of Wind that deals Physical Damage and Knocks Up enemy gods and yourself. The Gust area continually deals Physical Damage . You gain increased Attack Speed while in the outer area of the Gust.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
The Attack Speed buff is constantly refreshed while in the outer area.

abilities.name: Explosive Bolts
abilities.description: Your next 3 basic attacks are wider, have increased damage scaling, and explode on the first enemy hit . You gain increased Critical Strike Chance while this ability is active. This ability can gain multiple charges.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
This ability goes on cooldown immediately on use.

abilities.name: Agility
abilities.description: Dash forward and gain increased Strength . This ability can be used while Displaced and you will Dash further.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Dash range is longer when used while Displaced.
You can turn while Dashing.
You can turn while Dashing.

abilities.name: Air Strike
abilities.description: Dash forward and fly into the sky , dropping explosives and dealing Physical Damage to enemies beneath you. Select a landing location, or wait to Dash backwards , dealing Physical Damage to enemies again before selecting a landing location.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Jing Wei is fully CC Immune during buildup, ascent, flight, and descent.

abilities.name: Kali Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.
Has a 3 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1, 0.5, 0.5x damage and swing time.

abilities.name: Marked For Death
abilities.description: Mark a God. Gain Physical Penetration against that God. Killing that God restores [40% Max Hp]. Assists restore less health [15% Max HP]. You also gain bonus gold bounty [20% Bonus Gold]. Additionally, basic attacks and most abilities apply Rupture to enemies.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If a marked target dies, the enemy God closets to Kali becomes marked target.
You can use 'Interact Key' in the fountain to change your marked target

abilities.name: Nimble Strike
abilities.description: Leap forward to deal Physical Damage . Heal yourself on successful hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If you landed on the enemy god,
heal
for 10% of their missing health.
If you landed on multiple gods, restore based on the god that would
heal
you the most.

abilities.name: Lash
abilities.description: Throw 3 blades each dealing Physical Damage and applying a bleed. The bleed deals Physical Damage every 0.5s for 3s.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Applies 1 stack of Rupture for each blade hit.

abilities.name: Incense
abilities.description: Stun enemies with incense, gaining bonus Strength and Intelligence. Siphon targets, dealing Physical Damage and healing 20 health per hit. Deal Physical Damage and Heal per Rupture stack, consuming them.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
All heals after the first are reduced by 80%. The Strongest heal is resolved first.
Non-god targets with a stack of Rupture are damaged and restore health as if they had 3 stacks.

abilities.name: Destruction
abilities.description: Become immune to death, displacement, slows, and roots. Deal Physical Damage to nearby enemies every 0.25s for its duration.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If you are below 15% health when the ultimate ends, you are restored to 15% of your health.
Each hit applies 1 stack of Rupture.

abilities.name: Khepri Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deal Magical Damage to an enemy in front of Khepri.

stats: 100% Strength or Inhand Power and 20% Intelligence

abilities.notes:
Notes:
If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.
Has a 3 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1, 0.5, 1.5x damage and swing time.

abilities.name: Fortitude
abilities.description: Every 5s apply a 2% Health Shield to Khepri and his allies. The interval is increased to 10s if Khepri has taken or dealt damage in the last 5s.

abilities.name: Abduct
abilities.description: Khepri Lunges forward, grabbing and pulling backwards the first enemy hit. This deals 80 [40% Intelligence] Magical Damage . Khepri gains Physical and Magical Protection while pulling a god. The lunge damages enemies you pass through.

abilities.name: Rising Dawn
abilities.description: Khepri rolls the sun forward, setting ablaze all enemies it touches. Affected enemies repeatedly take 10 [5% Intelligence] Magical Damage over time. Affected enemies have reduced Physcial Protection . Allies hit gain Damage Mitigation . After reaching max distance the sun sets, reapplying all effects in a larger area.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Damage hits 11 times, hitting every 0.3s.

abilities.name: Solar Flare
abilities.description: Khepri calls down the sun's ire, dealing 60 [30% Intelligence] Magical Damage and Rooting enemies in an area.

abilities.name: Scarab's Blessing
abilities.description: Khepri blesses an allied god for 5s. If the blessed ally would die while blessed, they are instead revived at Khepri's location. Blessed allies are cleansed of crowd control effects. Blessed allies receive Strength, Intelligence, and Movement Speed . Blessed allies are Slow Immune . Successfully Revive an Ally to gain a permanent stacking buff of 2 Protections.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Executed allies do not revive.

abilities.name: Kukulkan Basic Attack
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Magical Damage to the first enemy hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

abilities.name: Power of the Wind Jewel
abilities.description: Gain increased Intelligence from the items that provide Maximum Mana.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
This effect does not scale off Base God Mana.

abilities.name: Zephyr
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that explodes on the first enemy hit. The explosion deals Magical Damage and Slows enemies in the area.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on walls.

abilities.name: Slipstream
abilities.description: Become Slow Immune and gain 4 Stacks of Movement Speed that gradually falls off over the duration of the effect. Activate this ability while within the area of Whirlwind to Dash instead, dealing Magical Damage and Slowing enemies hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Movement Speed Buff is applied as 4 stacks. Stacks are lost one at a time.
Dash passes through and hits all enemy types.

abilities.name: Whirlwind
abilities.description: Create a Whirlwind that repeatedly applies a Magical Damage over Time to enemies in the area.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
The Whirlwind attempts to apply the effect every 0.35 seconds for 4 seconds.
Damage over Time and Slow are refreshed on each hit.
Damage over Time hits 6 times over 2.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Spirit of the Nine Winds
abilities.description: Fire a delayed projectile that deals Magical Damage and Displaces enemies hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile passes through and damages all enemy targets, and passes through walls.
Enemies are Displaced up and away from the projectile.

abilities.name: Loki Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.
Has a 5 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 1.5x damage and swing time.

abilities.name: Behind You
abilities.description: Hitting enemies from behind deals increased damage to them.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
