The increased damage from this effect also triggers on enemies Blinded by Agonizing Visions.

abilities.name: Vanish
abilities.description: Activate to enter Stealth and gain Movement Speed . Your next basic attack deals additional Physical Damage over time. Killing a god immediately refreshes the cooldown of this ability.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Hits 4 times over 2 seconds.
Stealthed Gods are invisible to enemies unless they enter an enemy structure's attack area.
Taking damage while Stealth partially reveals you for 0.33 seconds.
You are Immune to Slows while Stealthed.
Stealth is broken when hit by Hard CC.

abilities.name: Agonizing Visions
abilities.description: Create a Vision of Loki that repeatedly deals Physical Damage to enemies around it and reduces their damage dealt . Enemies hit 4 times are Blinded .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
This ability hits 8 times over 3.5s.
Blinded players have their game camera obscured.
The Vision Impedes enemy characters only.
Loki benefits from Behind You on Blinded enemies from all directions.

abilities.name: Flurry Strike
abilities.description: Channel to deal Physical Damage and Slow enemies in front of you. The final hit deals increased Physical Damage and applies a stronger Slow. You are Displacement Immune while Channeling.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Hits 6 times over 1.5 seconds.
Slow is refreshed with each hit but does not stack.
This ability can benefit from Behind You.

abilities.name: Assassinate
abilities.description: Teleport to the target location, deal Physical Damage to and Cripple enemies in the area. Then deal Physical Damage and Stun enemies in front of you.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Loki locks onto the enemy god closest to the center of the teleport location, if there is one.
Loki is CC Immune while using this ability.

abilities.name: Medusa Basic Attack
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Physical Damage to the first enemy hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

abilities.name: Sidewinder
abilities.description: Medusa suffers no movement penalty when strafing and half the movement penalty when backpedaling.

abilities.name: Viper Shot
abilities.description: Medusa gains 40% [10% Strength] Attack Speed and augments her next 4 Basic Attacks, shooting vipers that poison the targets hit, dealing 10 [6% Strength and  8% Intelligence] Physical Damage every 0.5s for 1.5s. Each successful viper hit on an enemy god reduces the Cooldown of this ability by 0.5s.

abilities.name: Acid Spray
abilities.description: Medusa spits acid that deals 90 [50% Strength and 70% Intelligence] Physical Damage to the first enemy hit, then spraying out in a cone behind them. Enemies hit have their Healing Taken reduced for 5s. Acid Spray will explode on statues Medusa has created.

abilities.name: Lacerate
abilities.description: Medusa slithers forward, dealing 80 [75% Strength and 40% Intelligence] Physical Damage to all enemies she passes through. The first enemy god Medusa encounters causes her to stop before damaging and Rooting the God hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Destroys statues instantly when colliding with them during this ability.

abilities.name: Petrify
abilities.description: Medusa removes her mask, revealing her true face to deliver a powerful blast from her horrifying gaze. Enemies are dealt 270 [65% Strength and  85% Intelligence] Physical Damage and Stunned if they look at Medusa. Enemies are dealt 270 [72% Intelligence and  55% Strength] Physical Damage and Slowed if they are not looking at you. Medusa is CC Immune while using the ability.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
This ability does not hit through map walls and player made walls that block abilities.
Enemy gods that are killed while affected by this ability are turned into a stone statue and remain behind as a reminder to others.
Statues last indefinitely but may be killed with 4 Basic Attacks or by Lacerate.
When a statue is destroyed, the cooldown of Lacerate is reduced by 5s, Medusa gains a temporary Strength and Intelligence buff, and Medusa a permanent stack of Strength and Intelligence.

abilities.name: Mercury Basic Attack
abilities.description: Melee basic attack that deals Physical Damage .

abilities.name: Fastest God Alive
abilities.description: For every 1cm traveled, gain 0.04% damage bonus on his next Basic Attack (max 20%). You also gain additional Strength equal to 25% of Movement Speed from items or abilities.

abilities.name: Made You Look
abilities.description: Move in the blink of an eye, dealing Physical Damage to every enemy within a target area.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
This ability can Critically Hit, apply Ability Item effects, and apply Basic Attack Item effects.

abilities.name: Maximum Velocity
abilities.description: Passive: Gain increased Movement Speed. Active: Gain increased Attack Speed, cleanses yourself of Slows, and become immune to Slows for the duration.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Movement Speed from ranking this ability contributes power due to Fastest God Alive.

abilities.name: Special Delivery
abilities.description: You dash forward, Knock minions aside, and deal Physical Damage to them. Grab the first enemy god encountered, spinning them. The enemy god takes Physical Damage every 0.25s until the effect ends. They are then thrown in the direction you are facing.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Can be cancelled after hitting a god to throw them early.

abilities.name: Sonic Boom
abilities.description: Gather your energy for a powerful Dash. The range increases as you charge. Dash forward, dealing Physical Damage and spinning enemies hit along the dash. Gain Movement Speed after the dash that scales based on the energy gathered.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
The spin is treated as a stun.

abilities.name: Merlin Basic Attack
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Magical Damage to the first enemy hit. Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

abilities.name: Overload
abilities.description: Using an ability provides 1 stack of Overload. Firing a basic attack consumes 1 stack of Overload and deals Magical Damage to enemies hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
The damage from this ability can trigger ability item effects.

abilities.name: Eclipse
abilities.description: Conjure a celestial orb that grows in size as it travels, dealing Magical Damage to enemies and marking them. Marked enemies take additional Magical Damage if they stay within the outer range of Eclipse.

abilities.name: Radiate
abilities.description: Channel a beam of intense fire for 2s that deals Magical Damage every 0.25s. Each time Radiate hits an enemy, it also applies a Burn, dealing additional Magical Damage over time.

abilities.name: Frostbolt
abilities.description: Fire a Frostbolt that explodes when it hits an enemy, dealing Magical Damage in a small area. This ability deals an additional 15% damage if the enemy hit is slowed.

abilities.name: Vortex
abilities.description: Deploy a field of arcane energy. After a delay, the Vortex deals Magical Damage and Pulls enemies towards the center.

abilities.name: Dragonfire
abilities.description: Summon forth two ethereal dragons deal Magical Damage to enemies every 0.25s. If caught in the center of the area, enemies are afflicted by the Radiate Burn and gods have their Protections reduced.

abilities.name: Blizzard
abilities.description: Create a Blizzard, dealing Magical Damage repeatedly to enemies in an area. Enemies hit are debuffed with a stacking Slow

abilities.name: Flicker
abilities.description: You quickly Teleport a short distance. Depending on your current Stance, you gain different effects when using this ability. Arcane: Heal 30% of the damage taken within the last 4s Fire: For 4s, your basic attacks apply the Radiate Burn to enemies hit Ice: Ability Cooldowns are reduced 5s

abilities.name: Elemental Mastery
abilities.description: Tap into your inner potential, exploding with energy in your current stance dealing Magical Damage to enemies hit. After the explosion reaches its apex, it collapses in on itself dealing Magical Damage again. Enemies suffer different effects depending on which stance's energy they are being hit by: Arcane - Enemies hit are Knocked Up Fire - Enemies hit are afflicted by the Radiate Burn Ice - Enemies hit are Slowed

abilities.name: Elemental Mastery
abilities.description: Tap into your inner potential, exploding with energy in your current stance dealing Magical Damage to enemies hit. On use, a random Stance is selected with 2 random primary abilities and you gain Intelligence for a short duration After the explosion reaches its apex, it collapses in on itself dealing Magical Damage again. Enemies suffer different effects depending on which stance's energy they are being hit by: Arcane - Enemies hit are Knocked Up Fire - Enemies hit are afflicted by the Radiate Burn Ice - Enemies hit are Slowed
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Ability ranks are based off the ability's original ability group. Using a starting ability bar of a rank 3 Eclipse and a rank 1 Dragonfire as an example, generating Frostbolt and Radiate will give Merlin two rank 3 abilities, and then rerolling again and getting Vortex and Blizzard will give Merlin two rank 1 abilities.

abilities.name: Mordred Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.
Has a 4 hit chain. Attacks in order of Mourning, Clarent, Clarent, Mourning with a 1, 0.75, 0.75, 1x swing time.

abilities.name: Wrath of the Forsaken
abilities.description: Mordred can hit enemies to gain Wrath. His Ultimate Ability Heart Slash can only be used after reaching 40 Wrath. His Ultimate Ability Pursue the Weak can only be used after reaching 80 Wrath. After using an ability or attacking, Mordred's Interact key becomes a Dash forward. This deals Physical Damage and Knocks Back the first enemy god hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Hitting enemy gods with abilities provides 2 Wrath and 1 for basic attacks.
Hitting enemy minions provides 1 Wrath.
Gain 1 Wrath every 4s. passively.
Wrath can only be gained once per ability per enemy hit.

abilities.name: Cruel Strikes
abilities.description: Mordred strikes twice with his swords. Mordred first slashes, dealing 75 [45% Strength] Physical Damage to enemies in front of Mordred. Mordred then slams, dealing 85 [65% Strength] Physical Damage to enemies in a line and either dealing [40% Protections] Bonus Damage or 45% [Protections] Healing , based on Mordred's Basic Attack Chain.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Line attack deals Bonus damage on hit if Mourning is next in the basic attack chain.
Line attack Heals you on hit if Clarent is next in the basic attack chain.
Lower healing on hitting enemy minions.
Line attack Heals you on hit if Clarent is next in the basic attack chain.

abilities.name: Bloodrage
abilities.description: Mordred deals 70 [60% Strength and 40% Intelligence] Physical Damage to enemies around Mordred, then gains increased Attack Speed and Movement Speed . While buffed, basic attack hits on enemies reduce their Physical Protections and increase his own .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Physical Protection buff and debuff stacks up to 4 times.

abilities.name: Severing Slice
abilities.description: Mordred fires a projectile that deals 55 [70% Intelligence] Physical Damage and Slows enemies. Direct hits with the center of the projectile cause targets to Bleed, taking 25 [12% Strength] Bonus Damage as they move.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Enemy gods are damaged for every 1.25m they move.
Minions take damage over time instead of due to movement.

abilities.name: Heart Slash
abilities.description: Mordred deala 100 [75% Strength] Physical Damage to enemies in an area in front of Mordred. If you he hits an enemy god, they are Rooted . Mordred then channels to siphon their lifeforce, gaining a 160 Health Shield and Healing over time for 10 [20% Intelligence] Healing ,  while dealing 30 [25% Intelligence] Physical Damage repeatedly to that enemy.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Ability repeatedly deals damage every 0.3s. over 1.5 seconds.
You are Slowed while Channeling.

abilities.name: Pursue the Weak
abilities.description: Mordred becomes CC Immune and charges forward, traveling through walls , stopping on the first enemy god hit. Nearby enemies take 170 [80% Strength and 75% Intelligence] Physical Damage and are Stunned . After a short delay, Mordred launches himself and Stunned enemies into the sky , repeatedly dealing 80 [20% Strength and 15% Intelligence] Physical Damage . Mordred gains 30 [25% Intelligence] Health per enemy god hit with this attack.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Charge lasts 4 seconds but will continue if within a wall, ending immediately when possible.
Mordred gains vision of all enemies around him while Charging.
If no enemy gods are able to be Displaced, the follow-up attack will not start.

abilities.name: Neith Basic Attack
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Physical Damage to the first enemy hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

abilities.name: Broken Weave
abilities.description: Your abilities can create Weaves or detonate them to deal additional Physical Damage and Root enemis in a larger area. Detonate Weaves to gain a stacking Attack Speed and Intelligence increase per Weave detonated.

abilities.name: Spirit Arrow
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Physical Damage and Roots enemies. Hitting a Weave detonates it.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile passes through and damages all enemies, and passes through walls.

abilities.name: Unravel
abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to enemies in the area. Heal yourself on successful hit or Heal a larger amount when hitting a God. Creates Weaves in the area.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Always creates a Weave in the center of the area. Creates additional Weaves for each enemy God hit at the locations of those Gods.

abilities.name: Back Flip
abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to enemies in front of you, then Leap backwards. Hitting a Weave with the initial damage detonates it.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
This ability can Leap over walls, as long as you can reach a valid landing area.

abilities.name: World Weaver
abilities.description: Channel to begin charging an attack and lock on to an enemy God. Reactivate to fire a homing projectile at the selected God that deals Physical Damage and Stuns .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Damage scales linearly from 50% to 100% based on Channel time.
Channel for 0.5 seconds for minimum damage, or for 2 seconds to deal fully charged damage.
Projectile ignores minions, passes through walls.
Enemy Gods can step in front of this projectile to be hit by it instead of the selected god.
You can cancel this ability anytime before firing, the costs and cooldown will not be consumed.

abilities.name: Nemesis Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.
Has a 4 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1, 1, 0.75, 1.25x damage and swing time.

abilities.name: Scales of Fate
abilities.description: Hitting enemies with Basic Attacks reduces the target's Inhand Power, Strength, and Intelligence while increasing Nemesis's.

abilities.name: Swift Vengeance
abilities.description: Nemesis Dashes in a line, passing through all enemies. Deals 50 [35% Strength] Physical Damage to all enemies hit. Nemesis may dash again within 2 seconds.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
May use Basic Attacks and Abilities between dashes.

abilities.name: Slice and Dice
abilities.description: Nemesis slashes in a cone, dealing 70 [40% Strength and 25% Intelligence] Physical Damage to all enemies hit. Enemies in the center of the slash take 100 [80% Strength and 75% Intelligence] Physical Damage and are Slowed .

abilities.name: Retribution
abilities.description: Nemesis gains a 100 [7% MaxHealth] Health Shield for a duration. Heals 50% [10% Intelligence] of the damage taken during the effect. Nemesis reflects 40% [20% Strength] of the damage taken from gods as Physical Damage .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Hard Crowd Control removes the
Shield
.

abilities.name: Divine Judgement
abilities.description: Nemesis chooses a single enemy god, dealing 10% of their Current Health [45% Strength and 65% Intelligence] as Physical Damage to them and all enemies in an area around them. Nemesis gains Movement Speed and a percentage of the enemy's Protections . Reduces enemy's Movement Speed and Protections by the same amount.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Gains Protections equal to the enemy with the most Protections.
Gain Protections equal to the enemy.
On hitting an enemy, a homing projectile spawns from them, granting the buffs when it reaches Nemesis.

abilities.name: Divine Judgement
abilities.description: Choose a single enemy god, averaging the current Health between Nemesis and the target. This Damages the enemy and Heals Nemesis as long as Nemesis' current Health is lower than the targets'. Gain Movement Speed and a percentage of the enemy's Protections . Reduce enemy's Movement Speed and Protections by the same amount.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Gain
Protections
equal to the amount reduced from the target.
On hitting an enemy, a homing projectile spawns from them, granting the buffs when it reaches Nemesis.

abilities.name: Nu Wa Basic Attack
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Magical Damage to the first enemy hit.

stats: 100% Strength or Inhand Power and 20% Intelligence

abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

abilities.name: Strength of Wood
abilities.description: Every 12s your next Basic Attack will Root all targets hit. Damaging an enemy god with a Basic Attack will reduce this cooldown by 1s.

abilities.name: Mysterious Fog
abilities.description: Nu Wa sends a dense fog slowly forward that deals 50 [50% Intelligence] Magical Damage when it touches an enemy. Enemies that remain in the fog take additional damage every second. You and Allied Gods are Stealthed when inside the fog. Gain Strength of Water, which gives you Movement Speed . Allied gods that enter the fog gain Strength of Water.
abilities.notes: Notes:

abilities.name: Clay Soldiers
abilities.description: Nu Wa summons Clay Soldiers to attack the chosen target. Clay Soldiers will dash at enemies within 4.8 meters, dealing Magical Damage , then begin to basic attack. Clay Soldiers last for 10s. Gain Strength of Earth, which gives you Penetration .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If you have not chosen a target, Clay Soldiers will attack the nearest enemy or an enemy god that damages Nu Wa.

abilities.name: Shining Metal
abilities.description: Nu Wa launches a projectile dealing 90 [65% Intelligence] Magical Damage to enemies it passes through. If the projectile hits a Clay Soldier it explodes, dealing damage in an area and Stunning enemies and towers. Gain Strength of Metal, causing your Basic Attack to deal Magical Damage in an area when you hit an enemy.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile passes through and damages all enemies, and passes through walls.

abilities.name: Fire Shards
abilities.description: Nu Wa becomes CC Immune and ascends into the air. You and your team gain visibility on all enemy gods. Summon Fire Shards that deal 100 [30% Intelligence] Magical Damage to each enemy god. Gain Strength of Fire, which causes your Basic Attacks to go farther and faster.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
While beginning to ascend, you cannot be impeded.
When buffed by Strength of Fire, Nu Wa's Basic Attack range is increased to 12.8m.

abilities.name: Odin Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.
Has a 4 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1, 1, 1, 1.5x damage and swing time.
The final hit of the chain hits all targets in the area for 2x damage.

abilities.name: Path to Valhalla
abilities.description: When a god dies, Odin gains a brief increase to his Movement Speed, Strength and Intelligence .

abilities.name: Lunge
abilities.description: Odin Leaps forward, dealing 120 [75% Strength] Physical Damage to nearby enemies as he lands. If Odin has a Shield from Raven Shout, it explodes upon landing.

abilities.name: Raven Shout
abilities.description: Odin gains a 100 [40% Strength and 50% Intelligence] Health Shield for a duration. After the duration, the Shield explodes dealing Physical Damage equal to the remaining Shield Health to nearby enemies. If the Shield is at full HP when it explodes, it deals 100 Physical Damage instead.

abilities.name: Gungnir's Might
abilities.description: Odin charges up, pulsing damage around him, then throws his spear. The pulses deal 50 [60% Intelligence] Physical Damage and Slow enemies. The spear deals 60 [75% Strength] Physical Damage and Stuns if fired after two pulses. Can only stun the first god hit but pierces gods hit. If Odin refires the spear early, nearby allies get Attack Speed and this ability has a 40% reduced cooldown.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile passes through and damages all targets, stops on the first God hit, and stops on walls.

abilities.name: Ring of Spears
abilities.description: Odin creates a ring of spears that impedes enemies. Enemy gods who die in the ring grant Odin a permanent STR and INT buff. Max 10 Stacks. On casting, Odin will gain a stack of Path to Valhalla. Enemies in the area cannot Heal and have reduced Strength and Intelligence . Enemies who leave the area take 120 [75% Strength] Physical Damage and are Slowed , unless exiting through a segment of the ring destroyed by basic attacks.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Ring of Spears does not block ally movement or projectiles, only enemy basic attacks and enemy God movement.
The Ring is made of 8 Segments that each have 5 Hit Points. An enemy basic attack will deal 1 Hit Point per hit.
If an enemy god dies inside the cage, gain a permanent Strength and Intelligence buff.
Odin is immune to Slows and Roots while in the Ring.

abilities.name: Pele Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.
Has a 3 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1, 1, 1.5x damage and swing time.

abilities.name: Everlasting Flame
abilities.description: When you drop below 50% Health , gain increased Strength and Lifesteal . This effect has a cooldown.

abilities.name: Pyroclast
abilities.description: Pele fires a Magma projectile that deals 60 [60% Strength] Physical Damage and grants fuel per enemy hit. At max range the Magma persists and fires additional shard projectiles back to Pele, dealing 30 [15% Strength] Physical Damage to enemies. The number of shards is dependent on the rank of this ability. Pele has 2 charges of this ability.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Both projectiles types pass through and damage all enemies, and passes through walls.

abilities.name: Eruption
abilities.description: Pele stomps and lets the ground erupt, dealing 70 [80% Strength] Physical Damage and Knocking Up enemies around her. At ranks 3 and 5, this area gains an additional explosion areas, which deal 140 [60% Strength] Physical Damage and a smaller Knock Up . Activating this ability while in the amplified state of Magma Rush will cause you to Dash a short distance before erupting.

abilities.name: Magma Rush
abilities.description: Pele repeatedly deals 10 [5% Strength] Physical Damage to nearby enemies and gain Movement Speed while this ability is active. Magma Rush uses Fuel for its duration and has no cooldown. Reactivate this ability to amplify the effect, expending more fuel but dealing increased 20 [20% Strength] Physical Damage and gaining additional movement speed .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Fuel Regens per second when this ability is deactivated. This ability cannot be activated under 10 Fuel.
This ability triggers no items.

abilities.name: Volcanic Rush
abilities.description: Pele becomes CC Immune , then Dashes forward, dealing 180 [60% Strength] Physical Damage and Slowing the first enemy god hit, and firing a cone attack that deals 100 [40% Strength] Physical Damage to other enemies. For the next 10 seconds or 4 attacks, every time Pele basic attacks an enemy, she deals reduced damage and also fires a cone attack.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
This ability triggers items only time across all 5 possible hits.

abilities.name: Poseidon Basic Attack
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Magical Damage to the first enemy hit.

stats: 100% Strength or Inhand Power and 20% Intelligence

abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.
Successfully hit basic attack generate Tide.

abilities.name: Changing Tides
abilities.description: Successfully hitting basic attacks generates Tide. Poseidon has increased Movement Speed and his abilities do additional bonus damage on the amount of Tide he has. Using abilities reduces Tide.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Each successful Basic Attack generates 10% Tide.
At Max Tide Movement Speed is increased by 10%.
At Max Tide abilities do 15% increased damage.

abilities.name: Tidal Surge
abilities.description: Poseidon summons a wave dealing 100 [70% Intelligence] Magical Damage and Knocks Back enemies. Activate while Trident is out to send out two additional waves. Subsequent wave hits deal 50% less damage. Tide Cost -15%. These waves pass through everything
abilities.notes: Notes:

abilities.name: Trident
abilities.description: Poseidon activates his Trident, gaining increased Attack Speed, Movement Speed, and Basic Attack Damage . While activated, Tidal Surge and Basic Attacks fire two additional shots. The additional Basic Attacks shots apply ability damage and trigger ability on-hit effects. All Basic Attacks shots increase Tide on successful hit. This ability does not cost Tide.

abilities.name: Whirlpool
abilities.description: Poseidon summons a whirlpool, Crippling , Vortexing , and dealing 15 [20% Intelligence] Magical Damage repeatedly to enemies in an area. Tide Cost -15%.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
This ability hits 6 times over 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Release The Kraken!
abilities.description: Poseidon summons the Kraken, dealing 175 [40% Intelligence] Magical Damage and Slowing enemies in its area. Enemies in the center area when it spawns take 350 [100% Intelligence] Magical Damage instead and are Stunned and Knocked Up . Tide Cost -20%

abilities.name: Princess Bari Basic Attack
abilities.description: Fires a projectile that deals Magical Damage to the first enemy hit. Mystic Surge: Deals 50% Damage to enemies within 2.4m of where the projectile stops.

stats: 100% Strength or Inhand Power and 20% Intelligence

abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectiles stops on first enemy hit, and does not pass through walls.

abilities.name: Mystic Surge
abilities.description: Princess Bari accumulates Spirit by dealing damage to enemies. Upon reaching 100 Spirit Princess Bari enters Mystic Surge for 5s and can use any of her first 3 abilities with no cooldown. Abilities used this way have a bonus effect. Princess Bari gains Strength, Intelligence, and Attack Speed while in her Mystic Surge based on the rank of Spirit's Cadence.

abilities.name: Spirit Bell
abilities.description: Princess Bari lobs a bell, dealing 65 [80% Strength and 65% Intelligence] Magical Damage to enemies where it lands. Warding Gusts or Reverent Steps pushes the bell, dealing 45 [80% Strength and 65% Intelligence] Magical Damage and Slowing enemies hit. Mystic Surge: +20% Lob Damage , and now applies a Slow . +20% Rolling Damage and now applies Stun . The bell itself is 1.67x the size.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Warding Gusts will push the Bell towards Princess Bari if it is within Basic Attack range and has landed before casting Warding Gusts.
Princess Bari can only have 3 Bells deployed.

abilities.name: Warding Gust
abilities.description: Princess Bari swipes her fan dealing 65 [55% Strength and 45% Intelligence] Magical Damage to enemies and Knockbacks enemies who are close. -30% Damage to enemies further away. Mystic Surge: +20% Damage and Knockback . Bells pushed are treated as Mystic Surge Bells.

abilities.name: Reverent Steps
abilities.description: Princess Bari dances for a short burst of speed in any direction, then fires a projectile dealing 10 [110% Strength and 40% Intelligence and 100% Inhand Power] Magical Damage when it ends. Hitting a god grants 50 Spirit and reduces this ability's Cooldown by 25%. Mystic Surge: +20% Damage , dealt instantly in a line. Bells pushed are treated as Mystic Surge Bells.

stats: 95% Strength and 55% Intelligence and 100% Inhand Power

abilities.notes:
Notes:
Princess Bari has no strafing or backpedal penalty while firing.

abilities.name: Spirit's Cadence
abilities.description: Princess Bari conjures a spiritual dance that pulses three times. The first two pulses deal 50 [30% Strength and 25% Intelligence] Magical Damage The last pulse deals 100 [60% Strength and 70% Intelligence] Magical Damage . Pulses apply a stacking Slow . Princess Bari and her allies in the area gain Guarding Spirits for 4s. When taking lethal damage Princess Bari becomes Immune , Silenced , and Disarmed for 1.5s. Casting this ability immediately places Princess Bari in Mystic Surge for 10s.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Slow
stacks three times.
Gods can receive Guarding Spirits only once per Spirit Cadence use.

abilities.name: Ra Basic Attack
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Magical Damage to the first enemy hit.

stats: 100% Strength or Inhand Power and 20% Intelligence

abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

abilities.name: Speed of Light
abilities.description: After using an ability, Ra gains Movement Speed . This buff stacks up to 3 times.

abilities.name: Celestial Beam
abilities.description: Ra summons a moving beam of intense light, dealing 95 [105% Intelligence] Magical Damage to enemies.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
This ability can go through walls

abilities.name: Divine Light
abilities.description: Ra emanates light in an area around him that repeatedly Slows enemies before exploding, dealing 70 [70% Intelligence] Magical Damage . For a period after activation, basic attacks fire solar rays, dealing Magical Damage . The solar rays count as abilities, trigger ability effects, and pierce targets. Enemies looking at Ra gain additional Slow stacks and are Blinded by the explosion.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
A Slow stack is applied every 0.5 s.
The explosion occurs after 2s. s.
This ability cleanses slows and provides a very small window of slow immunity

abilities.name: Solar Blessing
abilities.description: Ra summons a pillar of blessed light, repeatedly dealing 20 [30% Intelligence] Magical Damage and 50% Healing allies for 12 Health . The light empowers Ra and allied gods in the area, granting Strength, Intelligence, Physical Protection and Magical Protection .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
The pillar of light ticks 6 times over 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Searing Pain
abilities.description: Ra blasts enemies in front of him with a wave of heat, dealing 375 [125% Intelligence] Magical Damage . Deals bonus damage to gods based on their maximum Health .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
This ability, like Celestial Beam, can go through walls.

abilities.name: Rama Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

abilities.name: Astral Quiver
abilities.description: Rama's Astral Quiver generates an Astral Arrow every 12s. Each Basic Attack reduces the time to generate an Astral Arrow by 2s. The first time a fired Astral Arrow hits an enemy, it has a chance to drop to the ground. Dropped Astral Arrows last for 10s, and picking one up restores 10 Mana.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Rama can hold up to 5 Astral Arrows.
Rama always respawns with a full Astral Quiver.
Drop Chance
: 30% + 1% Per Level

abilities.name: Astral Strike
abilities.description: Switch to a more powerful arrow that deals an additional 0 Physical Damage , pierces, and Slows enemies. While this ability is active, each Basic Attack consumes 1 Astral Arrow and Mana.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
This ability allows your Basic Attacks to pass through all enemies and walls.
This ability's bonus damage is reduced by 20% to each target hit after the first.
Rama cannot toggle this ability if he has no Astral Arrows.

abilities.name: Infinite Arrows
abilities.description: Rama focuses his mind and gain increased Attack Speed . When activating this ability, if there are any dropped Astral Arrows within 8.8m of Rama, he automatically collects them. While this buff is active, every third successful Basic Attack on an enemy god will immediately generate an Astral Arrow.

abilities.name: Rolling Assault
abilities.description: Rama Rolls in the direction he is currently travelling. For the next 5s after rolling, his next Basic Attack will have Haste and consume an Astral Arrow, Crippling all enemies hit and dealing an additional 35 [30% Strength] Physical Damage .

abilities.name: Astral Barrage
abilities.description: Rama launches himself into the air for up to 5s and shoots 3 powerful arrows at the ground, with each successive shot dealing increasing Physical Damage while decreasing in size.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Each time Rama picks up an Astral Arrow, the cooldown of this ability is reduced by 0.4s.

abilities.name: Scylla Basic Attack
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Magical Damage to the first enemy hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

abilities.name: Quick Learner
abilities.description: Your abilities gain an additional effect at max rank. In addition, gain Intelligence and Mana Regen for each max rank ability.

abilities.name: Sic 'Em
abilities.description: Send two hounds forward, Rooting, Crippling, and dealing Magical Damage. At max rank, the two closest enemies to the first target will also be hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on walls.

abilities.name: Crush
abilities.description: Creates a magical field that Slows enemies. After 5 seconds it detonates, dealing Magical Damage. At max rank, enemies in the area also have their magical protection reduced and the field persists if detonated early.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Reactivate to detonate the field early.
Can be reactivated even if affected by crowd control or dead.

abilities.name: Sentinel
abilities.description: Summon a sentinel at the target area, granting vision of enemies for 5 seconds, Reactivate the ability to Leap to the sentinel location and gain a buff that causes your next Basic Attack to deal Magical Damage. At max rank, hitting an enemy god with the empowered Basic Attack reduces your active ability cooldowns.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Sentinel vision is granted through line of sight blockers.

abilities.name: I'm a Monster
abilities.description: Become CC Immune for the next 6 seconds, and gain Movement Speed. Reactivate to deal Magical Damage at the target area. If you kill an enemy god with this attack, the duration resets and you may attack again. Whenever this ability deals damage to enemy gods you gain 1 stack, killing enemy gods provides 3. At max rank, each stack provides bonus damage to this ability.

abilities.name: Quick Learner
abilities.description: You cannot gain Mana from other sources but damaging enemies with your non-ultimate abilities provides Mana instead. In addition, gain Intelligence for each max rank ability. You gain 2% of your Max Mana + Mana Cost of the ability used when hitting enemy gods.

abilities.name: I'm a Monster
abilities.description: All of your Mana is consumed as you become CC immune for the next 6s. This ability can be reactivated up to three times dealing Magical Damage at the target area. 100% Mana is required to cast this ability. Whenever this ability deals damage to enemy gods you gain 1 stack. Killing enemy gods provides 3. Each stack provides max Mana and at max rank, you gain 500 bonus Mana.

abilities.name: Sobek Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deal Magical Damage to an enemy in front of you.

stats: 100% Strength or Inhand Power and 20% Intelligence

abilities.notes:
Notes:
If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.

abilities.name: Blessing of the Nile
abilities.description: When Sobek attacks, he gains a stack of Protections . This effect stacks 3 times and lasts for 10s. An ability can only provide one stack per cast.

abilities.name: Charge Prey
abilities.description: Sobek dashes forward. The first enemy hit takes 70 [50% Intelligence] Magical Damage and stops the dash. Sobek displaces the enemy behind him. Damaged enemies are Stunned before being thrown. Sobek is Displacement Immune while dashing and CC Immune while throwing.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Sobek has a 0s Postfire on a missed charge or a 0.3s postfire when he attempts to throw. This 0.3s postfire occurs both after a throw and if the enemy frees themselves with CC Immunity.

abilities.name: Tail Whip
abilities.description: Sobek spins his tail, dealing 80 [40% Intelligence] Magical Damage in an area around Sobek. Damaged enemies are also Displaced away from Sobek.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If you have not chosen a target, Clay Soldiers will attack the nearest enemy or an enemy god that damages Nu Wa.

abilities.name: Sickening Strike
abilities.description: Sobek strikes in front of him. This strike deals 70 [30% Intelligence] Magical Damage in a cone and applies Disease , reducing healing received for 5s. Enemies diseased take to enemies Bonus Magical Damage , take Reduced Healing , and can spread the disease for 2.5s. Each enemy god hit by the cone reduces this ability's cooldown by 1s and Heals Sobek up to 4.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
The disease will spread to enemies within 3.2m of someone currently diseased.
The Damage over Time does not trigger item effects.

abilities.name: Lurking in the Waters
abilities.description: Sobek submerges, Slowing enemies nearby and granting you CC Immunity , Protections , and Mana Regen . After 4 seconds, emerge dealing 300 [80% Intelligence] Magical Damage to enemies in range. Sobek can cancel this ability early, dealing less damage. Executes enemies below 10-25% HP , scaling with time submerged. Executed or killed enemies Heal Sobek and grant 25 permanent bonus Health .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Lurking in the Water's deals
25%
of its potential damage if emerging instantly.
Sobek can pass through enemies and spawned walls while submerged.

abilities.name: Sol Basic Attack
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Magical Damage to the first enemy hit. Generates Heat.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

abilities.name: Unstable Manifestation
abilities.description: Gain Heat from hitting enemies with basic attacks or from using abilities to gain increased Strength, Intelligence, and Attack Speed . At Max Heat, increase your basic attack damage .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Ranges from 0 to 100 Heat.
Heat starts depleting if you have not generated Heat within the last 6 seconds.
Heat depleats over time at a rate of 6 Heat per 0.33 seconds.

abilities.name: Radiance
abilities.description: Create a Pool of Flames at your location. Heal yourself over time, and instantly generate Heat. The pool repeatedly deals Magical Damage to enemies in the area. The more Heat you have at the time the pool is created, the larger its area will be.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Pool scales from 1x radius at 0 Heat to 2x radius at 100 Heat.
This ability hits 3 times over 3 seconds.
Heals 6 times over 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Stellar Burst
abilities.description: Your next basic attack fires a projectile that explodes, then retracts, and generates Heat. Both the explosion and the retraction deal Magical Damage to enemies and Slows them.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops and explodes on first enemy hit, walls, or max range.
Can only trigger ability based items and effects.
Grants Haste.

abilities.name: Disapparate
abilities.description: Gain Movement Speed, and Slow Immunity , begin creating a Trail of Flames behind you, and instantly generate Heat. The Trail persists and repeatedly deals Magical Damage to enemies in the area. After 3 seconds, detonate the Trail dealing Magical Damage , become Immune and unable to attack.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
You can cancel out of the Immune state early.
This Immune state is Damage Immunity, Healing Immunity, CC Immunity, Untargettable, and makes you able to pass through allies, enemies, and Impediments.

abilities.name: Supernova
abilities.description: Channel to generate Heat, select 8 areas, then repeatedly deal Magical Damage to enemies in those areas. The first time an enemy is hit, they are Displaced . All subsequent hits deal decreased damage. You are CC Immune while Channeling.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Areas are selected every 0.18 seconds or when your targeter has moved more than 1.8 meters since the last area was selected.

abilities.name: Sun Wukong Basic Attack
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals ? Physical Damage to the first enemy hit.

abilities.name: Undefeated Body
abilities.description: When you drop below 60% health, gain increased Strength, Intelligence, and Protections. If you go above this threshold, the buff persists for a short duration. When you drop below 30% health, you spawn a clone. This effect has a cooldown.

abilities.name: The Magic Cudgel
abilities.description: Slam down with your Cudgel, dealing Physical Damage.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
This ability has reduced Strength Scaling but increased Intelligence Scaling to enemies that are further away.
Intelligence increases the length of this ability.

abilities.name: Master’s Will
abilities.description: Strike around you dealing Physical Damage. Enemies hit are Slowed and have reduced Attack Speed.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
This ability has reduced Strength Scaling but increased Intelligence Scaling to enemies that are further away.
Intelligence increases the radius of this ability.

abilities.name: 72 Transformations
abilities.description: Transform into an Ox, Tiger, or Eagle, and charge forward
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Ox: Knockback enemies in your path, dealing Physical Damage
Tiger: Maul the first enemy you hit, dealing Physical Damage and Stunning them
Eagle: Is the fastest of the three forms

abilities.name: Somersault Cloud
abilities.description: Rise into a cloud leaving a clone to fight in your stead. While in the cloud you are Stealthed and Heal every 0.5s.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Refire to deal Physical Damage.
You are CC Immune while using this ability

abilities.name: Susano Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center od the area will be hit.
Has a 3 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1, 1, 1.25x damage and swing time.

abilities.name: Storm's Edge
abilities.description: When you use an ability your next basic attack will debuff the enemy hit. Weave in basic attack hits between abilities to progressively stack the debuff.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Enemies with 1-2 stacks have 10% reduced Strength.
Enemies with 3-4 stacks are Slowed by 15% and maintain previous Debuff.
Enemies with 5-6 stacks tale 10% increased damage and maintain previous Debuffs.
Debuffs last 3s and refresh on a new application.
Buff lasts 3s.
Each attack of Storm Kata can trigger ability item effects.

abilities.name: Storm Kata
abilities.description: Strike and deal Physical Damage to enemies in front of you. This ability can be used a second time to Spin and Deal Physical Damage to enemies around you. This ability can be used a third time to Dash forward and deal Physical Damage to all enemies hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
This ability Cooldown is increased by 1s for each additional attack used.
Dash passes through all enemies.

abilities.name: Wind Siphon
abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to enemies in front of you. Enemies in the inner area are also Pulled towards you.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Enemies are Pulled to the location in front of you at the start of the attack.

abilities.name: Jet Stream
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that stops on walls or the first enemy hit creating a Whirlwind which repeatedly deals Physical Damage . This ability can be used again to Teleport to the Whirlwind.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
The Whirlwind will travel with the enemy hit.
This ability Cooldown is reduced by 4s when Teleporting to an enemy.
Ability hits 6 times, over 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Typhoon
abilities.description: Create a Typhoon which repeatedly deals Physical Damage . This ability can be used again to fire the Typhoon, dealing Physical Damage and Displacing enemies hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
This ability automatically refires after 2s.
This ability starts at 50% Size and Damage and increases over the duration.
The Typhoon will travel in the duration Susano is facing on refire.

abilities.name: Thanatos Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.
Has a 3 hit chain. Attacks in an order of 1 / 0.75 / 1.5x damage and swing time.
The final swing hits all targets in range.

abilities.name: Harvester of Souls
abilities.description: Enemy Gods at low health are revealed to you and can be Executed by Hovering Death. Killing an enemy heals Thanatos and reduced all of his cooldowns. Thanatos' abilities cost health.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
The health threshold is determined by the rank of Hovering Death, using the first rank value when Hovering Death is unranked.

abilities.name: Death Scythe
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Physical Damage and Slows the first target hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on walls.
Gods hit by the projectile take 12.5% of their Max Health as bonus Physical Damage.
Thanatos Heals for 50% of the total damage done.

abilities.name: Scent of Death
abilities.description: Gain Movement Speed and Flat Penetration . Deal Bonus Damage and run faster towards enemies in Execute Range.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Bonus Movement Speed scales from 0% effectiveness to 100% effectiveness. 0% when the targets health is at Execute Threshold and 100% when the target is 1 health.

abilities.name: Soul Reap
abilities.description: Sweep in front of you to deal Physical Damage and Silence enemies hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Thanatos sweeps in front of him, inheriting any additional rotation during the fire.

abilities.name: Hovering Death
abilities.description: Fly into the sky and select a landing location. Deal Physical Damage and Stun enemies hit. Execute enemies at low health.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
You are rooted during activation.
Thanatos gains 125% Movement Speed while flying.
Execute kills enemies even if their death would normally be prevented by other god abilities.
If Thanatos is aiming at an invalid location when the ult expires, he will land on the last valid aimed location.
Thanatos is fully CC Immune during buildup, ascent, flight, and descent.

abilities.name: The Morrigan Basic Attack
abilities.description: Throw a projectile forward that deals Magical Damage to enemies hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
The Morrigan has a 3 hit chain. Attacks in an order of 1 / 1 / 1x damage and fire time. The final fire explodes on target, applying Doomsayer.

abilities.name: Doomsayer
abilities.description: The Morrigan's Basic Attacks has a 3 hit chain. The final Basic Attack explodes, dealing 9% of the targets Health over 3s.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
The DoT damage from this ability is now counted as ability damage.

abilities.name: Deadly Aspects
abilities.description: The Morrigan deals Magical Damage and Stun enemies in front of you after a brief buildup.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
The buildup for this ability does not break Confusion's Stealth.
Firing any other ability (including Purification beads) will cancel the wind-up of this ability.

abilities.name: Dark Omen
abilities.description: The Morrigan fires a projectile that deals Magical Damage . Enemy gods hit are marked. The mark triggers for Magical Damage when that god is damaged by any god ability.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile deals Minion Damage to non-god entities, these entities cannot be marked with Dark Omen.
The Morrigan deals the mark trigger damage, even if another god triggers it. She can receive kills this way.

abilities.name: Confusion
abilities.description: The Morrigan Stealths immediately and gains Movement Speed . The Morrigan sends a clone of herself in the direction she is currently facing.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
When the clone is damaged, it will appear as an illusion. It will change appearance and lose its health bar.
The clone grants vision around itself.
Taking damage while stealthed breaks the effect.

abilities.name: Changeling
abilities.description: The Morrigan selects a target to transform into. The Morrigan gains access to their abilities and items for 10 seconds.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If the god The Morrigan transforms into has an Ultimate Cooldown longer than this Ultimate's Cooldown, she uses the transformed targets Cooldown instead.
The Morrigan will copy all their abilities and active items, all with no cooldown.
The Morrigan will copy their ability ranks. If her level is different to the transform target's it will use the order they ranked their abilities, filling with Auto Skill as needed.
If The Morrigan is in the middle of firing an ability when the transform times out, she will detransform the moment that ability fire ends.
The Morrigan retains her Jungle Buffs and Fire Giant buff while transformed, while also gaining the buffs that her transformation currently has. (excluding Elixir's, which she doesn't gain nor retain on transform.)
The Morrigan can use the consumables of her selected Transformation, such as Wards, Runic Bomb, and Obsidian Dagger.
Detransformation cleanses all currently applied Crowd Control effects, immediately causing The Morrigan to detransform.
Transformation cleanses ALL effects, including allied ones such as Khepri's Ultimate, Scarab's Blessing. These effects are still applied to The Morrigan's base form, so if she dies while Blessed, she will immediately detransform and be revived.

abilities.name: Thor Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.

abilities.name: Warrior's Madness
abilities.description: Thor gains Strength for each enemy god near Thor, up to 3. After using Berserker's Barrage or Anvil of Dawn, Thor gains Thunderstruck . While Thunderstruck , Mjolnir deals bonus Physical Damage . Thunderstruck's damage can arc up to 2 nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Mjolnir's Attunement
abilities.description: Thor throws Mjolnir forwards, dealing 50 [35% Strength] Physical Damage to enemies as it travels. When it reaches max range it flies back to you. Gods hit by Mjolnir returning to Thor take 200% damage. Minions take 100% damage. Thor can reactivate while Mjolnir is traveling to Teleport to and catch Mjolnir.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Mjolnir must be in a valid location for Thor to be able to teleport to it.
Thor cannot teleport to Mjolnir if afflicted by Hard CC, Cripples or while firing a different ability.

abilities.name: Tectonic Rift
abilities.description: Thor slams Mjolnir down creating a fissure, dealing 30 [20% Strength] Physical Damage to enemies as it erupts. Enemies hit are also Stunned . The fissure blocks movement, but allows projectiles to pass through. Thor can reactivate to bring the fissure down early.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
The fissure appears over 0.3s, stunning and damaging enemies as it appears.

abilities.name: Berserker Barrage
abilities.description: Thor spins, dealing 30 [40% Strength] Physical Damage to enemies around Thor. Thor spins twice before unleashing a final cone attack that deals 50 [70% Strength] Physical Damage to enemies in front of Thor. Thor is Displacement Immune while Channeling. Thor gains 3s of Thunderstruck , causing Mjolnir hits to arc and damage nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Anvil of Dawn
abilities.description: Thor flies into the sky. Thor chooses a location dealing 100 [85% Strength] Physical Damage to enemies upon landing. Enemies hit are Stunned . Thor is CC Immune during this ability. Thor is Thunderstruck for after 6s after landing, causing Mjolnir to arc and damage nearby enemies.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If Thor is not aimed at a valid location, Thor will land at the closest valid point when aiming times out.

abilities.name: Ullr Basic Attack
abilities.description: Ullr's Basic Attacks change depending on his current stance. Bow: Fires a projectile that deals 0 [100% Strength and 20% Intelligence and 100% Inhand Power] Physical Damage to the first enemy hit. Axe: Deals 0 Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you.

stats: 100% Strength or Inhand Power and 20% Intelligence

abilities.notes:
Notes:
Bow projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.
If axe cone area contains multiple enemies, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.

abilities.name: Weapon Master
abilities.description: When Ullr uses an ability in either stance his Cooldowns in the opposite stance are reduced.

abilities.name: Bladed Arrow/Thrown Axe
abilities.description: Bow: Ullr fires an arrow that passes through enemies and deals 70 [75% Strength] Physical Damage to all targets hit. Axe: Ullr throws an axe that Stuns and deals 50 [70% Strength] Physical Damage to the first enemy it hits.

abilities.name: Expose Weakness/Invigorate
abilities.description: Bow: Ullr gains Bonus Attack Speed . Axe: Ullr gains Bonus Movement Speed .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
The buff persists after switching stances.

abilities.name: Hail of Arrows/Glory Bound
abilities.description: Bow: Ullr fires a volley, dealing 80 [100% Strength] Physical Damage . The arrow remains in the ground for 3s. If Ullr activates Wield Axes while the arrow is deployed, the area around it become snowy for 3s, Slowing enemies. Axe: Ullr leaps to deal 50 [55% Strength] Physical Damage . The axes remain in the ground for 3s. If Ullr activates Wield Bow while the axes are deployed, the axes tear open the ground, reducing Physical Protections of enemies hit.

abilities.name: Wield Axes/Wield Bow
abilities.description: Ullr changes stances, removes Disarms, and gains benefits depending on which stance you are in. Bow: Ranged Basic Attacks and additional Strength . Axe: Melee Basic Attacks and additional Lifesteal .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Ullr also gains half of the benefit of the opposing stance.

abilities.name: Vulcan Basic Attack
abilities.description: Fires a projectile that deals 5 Magical Damage to the first enemy hit.

stats: 100% Strength or Inhand Power and 20% Intelligence

abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

abilities.name: Master Craftsman
abilities.description: Vulcan has access to a variety of Mods in the shop that affects his abilities. There are 3 sets of mods available at different levels. Vulcan can only have one Mod from each set. Hitting an enemy god with an ability grants Vulcan increased Movement Speed and Mana Regen for 5s.

abilities.name: Backfire
abilities.description: Vulcan fires a projectile that causes him to Dash back and deal 90 [80% Intelligence] Magical Damage to all enemies it hits, marking the first god that is hit. Inferno Cannons will priotize hitting the marked god and deal 15% more damage to them for 4s.
abilities.notes: Notes:

abilities.name: Inferno Cannon
abilities.description: Vulcan creates an Inferno Cannon that shoots projectiles every 1s at an enemy in front of it, dealing 45 [40% Intelligence] Magical Damage . It lasts until destroyed or another is placed. Inherits Vulcan's penetrations but in addition to having 25% base Penetration. Does not trigger item effects.

abilities.name: Magma Bomb
abilities.description: Vulcan lobs a projectile that explodes on impact with the ground, dealing 80 [90% Intelligence] Magical Damage and Displacing enemies in an area. Enemies are displaced up and away from the explosion.

abilities.name: Earthshaker
abilities.description: Vulcan launches a projectile that explodes on impact with the ground, dealing 320 [120% Intelligence] Magical Damage to enemies in its area. Deals more damage the further the projectile travels. Deals 1.5x the total at max travel time.

abilities.name: Yemoja Basic Attack
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Magical Damage to the first enemy hit.

stats: 100% Strength or Inhand Power and 20% Intelligence

abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on the first target hit, and does not pass through walls.
Yemoja basic attacks can hit allies with an increased radius, applying Omi Healing.

abilities.name: Omi
abilities.description: Yemoja uses Omi to cast spells instead of Mana. Starting with 7, earning up to 10 Yemoja's water based attacks and abilities can hit allies, providing them a Heal for 1 + 0.2 per Level every 0.5s for 6s.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Additional Omi is gained at levels 5, 10 and 15.
Cooldown Reduction increase Omi regeneration.

abilities.name: Bouncing Bubble
abilities.description: Yemoja tosses a bubble that bounces twice, dealing 55 [30% Intelligence] Magical Damage and Slows enemies before exploding into smaller bubbles. Small bubbles deal 27.5 [15% Intelligence] Magical Damage .
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Enemies take reduced damage if hit by both large bubbles.
All Allies hit will also gain Omi Healing.
This ability changes to Moonstrike when used.

abilities.name: Moonstrike
abilities.description: Yemoja lets the moon strike multiple times at a location, dealing 40 [20% Intelligence] Magical Damage before a final strike dealing 65 [40% Intelligence] Magical Damage and Stunning enemies for 1s. Allies in the final strike have their Omi Healing replaced with a buff providing increased Attack Speed and Basic Attack Damage.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Enemy structures hit by the final strike are stunned for 2s.
This ability changes to Bouncing Bubble when used.

abilities.name: Mending Waters
abilities.description: Yemoja fires a water wave, dealing 65 [40% Intelligence] Magical Damage to enemies. This wave stops and bounces between allied gods, Healing then them for 20 Bonus Health and providing them a 30 [2% MaxHealth] Health Shield . This ability also does bonus damage to enemy Health Shields.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on walls or first allied gods.
Allies hit will also gain Omi Healing.

abilities.name: Riptide
abilities.description: Create a water ring that Knocks Back anyone entering it. Allies travel further and gain Movement Speed and Protections for 3s. Enemies are Slowed for 2s. Placing the ring at the maximum distance reverses its direction.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Allies that use the ring also gain Omi Healing.

abilities.name: River's Rebuke
abilities.description: Yemoja conjures two large walls of water that block enemy movement and projectiles. After a delay they crash down, dealing 250 [70% Intelligence] Magical Damage , Trembling and Slowing enemies hit. Allies impacted by the crashing waves gain Omi Healing and Moonstrike's buff. You gain a buff of increased Omi over time using this ability.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Enemies are slowed by 60%, decreasing to normal over 2s.
Yemoja gains half of her missing Omi immediately but the duration of regeneration buff is decreased based on the amount restored.

abilities.name: Ymir Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deal Magical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.

abilities.name: Frostbite
abilities.description: Your abilities apply Frostbite, causing enemies to take more basic attack damage from you and to deal less damage to you.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Frostbite's effect stacks with Critical Strikes.

abilities.name: Ice Wall
abilities.description: Create a Wall that Displaces enemies on creation. Applies Frostbite to Displaced enemies.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
The Wall Impedes all characters.
Create a Wall at your feet to Displace yourself up and forward.
Displaces enemies up and away from the Wall.
Reactivate to destroy the Wall early.

abilities.name: Glacial Strike
abilities.description: Deal Magical Damage and Slow enemies. Applies Frostbite on succesful hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Damaging area starts at Ymir and moves away over time.
You are Slowed by 42.5% during activation.

abilities.name: Frost Breath
abilities.description: Deal Magical Damage and Stun enemies in front of you. Applies Frostbite on succesful hit.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
You are Rooted during activation.

abilities.name: Shards of Ice
abilities.description: Channel to Slow enemies around you. Deal a burst of Magical Damage when the Channel is complete. Applies Frostbite immediately to enemies in the area. You are CC Immune while Channeling.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Damage scales linearly from 35% + 0.03% Intelligence to 100% based on Channel time.
Max Channel time of 3 seconds.
You are Rooted while Channeling.

abilities.name: Zeus Basic Attack
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Magical Damage to the first enemy hit. Applies Charges.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

abilities.name: Overcharge
abilities.description: Deal damage to apply Charges. Enemies take increased basic attack damage from you for each Charge they have.

abilities.name: Chain Lightning
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that hits and enemy and then chains to nearby enemies. Any enemies hit are dealt Magical Damage , Slowed , and receive a Charge
abilities.notes:
Notes:
Projectile stops on walls.

abilities.name: Thunderclap
abilities.description: Deal Magical Damage and apply a Charge to enemies around you, then gain increased Attack Speed, Movement Speed, and reduced basic attack Movement Penalty .

abilities.name: Detonate Charge
abilities.description: Activate to deal Magical Damage to enemies for each Charge, and Stun enemies that had max Charges.
abilities.notes:
Notes:
This ability cannot be activated unless an enemy has a Charge.
Damage is multiplied by 1/1.7/2.4 based on the number of Charges.

abilities.name: Lightning Storm
abilities.description: Deal Magical Damage repeatedly to enemies in the area, applying a Charge on each hit.
